Waiting time was about 10mins per guest ahead of you. Check-In: Frontdesk staff was super friendly, filled with calmness to address guests' every need despite the queue. Kudos to the front desk team! Room: In their cozy little custom-designed rooms with vintage decor, it's really relaxing with their comfy queen-sized beds. Good water pressure for the rain shower and highly recommended enjoying all bathroom amenities. It smells fantastic!

title: Amazing Stay
desc: Had a wonderful stay with my partner at Hotel G. The room was comfortable and cozy. We were attended by the friendly and helpful staff at reception. Special shout out to front office manager Howard and his team Debbie, Bella and Firdaus for being attentive during our staycation. Highly recommend this excellent hotel to everyone. We will definitely come back again!! Thanks all for great hospitality.

title: Centrally located
desc: Had a pleasant stay overall, great location, close to public transport, and amazing customer service. Check in and check out was smooth, nice restaurants and food outlets around. Thanks to Bella at reception.

title: Staycation
desc: This is our first time having a staycation at Hotel G and we were attended by your staff, Bella. She gave a very warm welcome and assisted us with our check in. She even gave a free upgrade to our room after knowing that it was my husband's birthday. Overall, our stay is very pleasant with Hotel G! Thank you!

title: 1day staycation
desc: Cozy room for 2. Functional living space and nice space planning! Will definitely be back again. Good for those who loves to walk ard as the hotel is walking distance with various malls and a Korean mart! Fantastic and friendly hotel crew who exercised flexibility and hospitality! üëçüèºüëçüèº For those who have some difficulty in walking, the walk can be slightly tedious and taxing as the pavement around are not elderly/mobility friendly.

title: Enjoyable stay
desc: Rooms are small, but good enough for 2 person. Location is good and close to severl MRT stations. Lastly, front desk service is excellent and we felt really welcoming by them. Will cone back again. Thank you hotel g singapore. Good job to you guys

title: Fast Check-in, Reasonable Price and Clean
desc: I was served by Bella from the Front Desk. She checked me in less than 5 minutes. Amazing! I remembered her from my last visit here last month. She never fails to serve with a smile while quickly sorting out the booking. I would recommend the hotel because of the reasonable price point for quick staycations, cleanliness of the room, and the comfy bed. This is probably my 5th time here, and counting. I‚Äôd recommend booking in earlier to get better prices. I‚Äôve dined at both Ginett Restaurant and 25 Degrees restaurants. Love the ambience!

title: Excellent Service, Comfortable Room
desc: Booked the hotel to relax and get away from reality. Was checked in smoothly by front desk staffs Natalie, Debbie & Nana. All information was clearly informed during the check in. Room was in great condition (got a corner quiet room) Loved the comfy bed! And cool addition of the dreamcatchers. Location wise was awesome! Surrounded by so many food and shopping options! Definitely will return again

title: Complimentary for Concierge Staff
desc: I would like to commend on the good hospitable service that your front service counter staff Ms Bella has provided. Her impeccable patience and accommodating tone reassures us that Hotel G is the right choice of staycation to go, in midst of angst of a pandemic. No doubt certain restrictions are lacking like fridge etc, she ensures that all our concerns are taken care of. Indeed an exemplary staff we haven't seen in a long while since coming to Hotel G several times.

title: Great service, nicely decorated
desc: Best boutique hotel I've stayed at. Immediately was greeted cheerfully by Daryl at the front desk and he helped to check me in swiftly. I was celebrating my anniversary with my bf and he offered early check in and late check out as well as a complimentary glass of wine at Ginett. I love the style of this hotel and the nice bar and french restaurant below! Everything was good. Room was small but tastefully done. Will stay here again! Only thing was the breakfast. wasn't fantastic but still of great value. The girl server at breakfast was a bit angry and impatient when it came to taking our orders. But other than that, pleasant stay! Will come back again to stay and dine at Ginett too!

title: Horrible, and please avoid it
desc: The first night my bed smelled horrible; they don't clean your room every day except your requests. I would advise anyone to stay at a different hotel. It's not suitable for someone not used to the smelly environment. The only positive thing shops are around the corner

title: Not so bad
desc: Check in at midnight however there no one to assist with the luggage. Room is small and no Sound proof. Mini bar was not cold and no wine glass. Request for Ice ,need to go to the lobby to collect. Some staff is friendly and some is not. Room is clean

title: Feedback for staff Daryl
desc: He was very welcoming and full of energy he helped me with my check in with great effort, even gave me two complimentary vouchers for two free in-house drinks at ginett restaurant. He was also so kind enough to help me check if it was possible to have late check out :)

title: clean and simple
desc: simple, clean and friendly, location of hotel is excellent near Hospital, MRT station, hotel staff very efficient, friendly provide good service, hotel amenities are OK, Light are OK convenient for work at room, Air Condition is OK, shower hot and cold water are OK

title: Holiday Trip
desc: Room was small,The pressure of the Shower is too slow.Called Front office no one pick up.Key card also not working after i check in Mini bar to small and no wine glass. Room is not soundproof u can heard people talking from outside Location is good near MRT and City

title: clean, cool modern vibe and friendly receptionist
desc: The check in process was fast and simple, the room was clean and tidy! Great for a solo stay. The location of the hotel is perfect is you want to walk around to many interesting spots in the district. it is also a 10 minutes walk to a train station.

title: Check in was simple and fuss free!
desc: The check in process was fast and simple, room was clean and tidy! Although it's a little small but it's really cozy and has all the necessities (just note that there's no mini fridge in the room). Bella at the front desk was very kind and helpful too ‚ò∫Ô∏è Pleasant experience, would visit again in the future!

title: Wonderful experience
desc: Our experience at wonderful. The staff was very friendly, helpful and quick at the services. Bella gave us a warm welcome and helped us with a smile at all times along with other staff members. The breakfast was also delicious.

title: Great Location Great Service great food
desc: Once u walked in, u felt welcome by lovely friendly staffs, Rina, Bella, Nana, Aiman and Darryl were welcoming us and made us feel like home, Room design is modern and comfortable bed! We love this hotel. Ginett is superb, good service and good foods!

title: Smol But Nice
desc: Location: Not Bad If u go from Bugis its kinda confusing if you don't know Singapore Room: Great King Room It's a bit smol but seems nice, very annoyed that you can't change the room temperature below 22degrees. The flashlight doesn't work as the battery is dead. And the safe battery is not functioning properly as when I locked it, it barely lit up & then I couldn't unlock it. Amenities: Shampoo, conditioner, Body wash, towels, Tissues are all provided Lacks some sockets if you're staying here for SHN. The lights are okay for working. Coffee is provided as well. That said the TV is very cool, especially it's coded to say your name . Unfortunately, If you don't identify as M or F, their website isn't coded for that. So for those foreigners who legally are Non-binary, sadly you

title: Kudos to Hema & Hani, a great stay from both of you!
desc: A pleasant arrival experience with the front desk receptionist named Hema & Hani. They have a great sense of hospitality which parallel to a world class service as they noticed one of the occupant actually celebrating the special occasion (BIR) on the actual arrival day. Kudos to both of them, you both did a brilliant job! On a side note, we would said the express service and the runners were well communicated as from the point we dial ‚Äò0‚Äô to we received the requested item just taken 10 mins which pretty much demonstrated the term ‚Äòteam work‚Äô! Very well stay! Thanks.

title: Disappointed Stay
desc: We spent 4 nights at our hotel and experience isn‚Äôt up to our expectations: Pros: - Nice design - Good location Cons: - No fridge as we couldn‚Äôt thought at 4 star hotel - Poor breakfast selection. You are only choose one main course, which is the most terrible and worth to choose to stay at others hotel including buffet breakfast. The hotel management should public explicitly about this option for guest to consider to book at this hotel rather than mention ‚ÄùBreakfast Included‚Äù - Service is just ok. Staff isn‚Äôt friendly and accommodating.

title: Nice stay in Singapore
desc: We've stayed for 2 nights and it was a nice stay. It was a small room but enough facility. Hope the price was cheaper. (+) Location: walking distance to MRT stations to explore the city (+) Facilities: new furnitures, toiletries, water, coffee and tea, kettle etc (+) Staff: kind and friendly, especially Mr. Daryl Goh (+) The room had window and looked exactly as picture (+) Wifi was strong (-) Nothing

title: 2nd staycation and it was even better
desc: It was my 2nd stay at the hotel as the 1st was great. Hotel is conveniently located within walking distance between the various MRTs line. Apart from the convenient location, hawker centre and shopping malls are nearby and there are a few tourist attractions within walking distance too. Reception services at the front desk are great and hassle free, I was able to check-in fuss free. Booked the Great King Room and in my opinion and it was great. The room had all basic amenities needed for a short stay and it is spacious enough for 2 person. Breakfast served at Ginette was great and lunching there was great due to its affordable pricing (within $10-$20/pax). But do remember to make reservation early as it is quite crowded during the weekends. Overall, I had an impressive stay at

title: Review
desc: Room is very clean and tidy. The staff named Bella was very friendly, cheerful and polite. She made an effort to ensure that we have the best possible stay at Hotel G. 10/10 for the service rendered by bellaüëçüèª

title: Great Location with resonable price
desc: Little bit small but others (location, breakfast, price .... and) quite good to revisit. Easily access to the Hotel (most Taxi deivers know the location). Recommend for the short - mid term Biz trip. (But it's quite small to share the room with others.)

title: Quick and good check-in!
desc: I‚Äôm a returned customer and I‚Äôm always very pleased by the quick check-in as well as the quality of service :) Daryl and his team are always on top on things which makes every stay hassle / stress free. Thank you for yet another great service & I look forward to returning again! :)

title: Top-Notch Service Excellence
desc: I've stayed with Hotel G many many times. It's probably the best 4* hotel in Singapore. The reservations team were prompt and accomodating to reasonable requests. Housekeeping team is always so helpful and timely in their worm. Senior Duty Manager - Mr. Daryl Goh is very attentive to my requests upon check-in, such a great experience! So glad that Hotel G has such a wonderful team. To many more stays ahead~

title: Could have been better
desc: Bad cleaning. Not very good location. Not possible to buy breakfast if not booked in advance (according to the unfriendly young small lady in charge of the breakfast). Bad elevators, took forever to get to/from room.

title: Modern facilities + great attention to detail
desc: Hotel room was clean, well maintained and the staff were friendly and polite. Breakfast was a selection from 1 of 5 main dishes: waffles, congee, american breakfast, etc. Free flow fruits, croissants and drinks were also available. The room TV has a good selection of channels but also supports screen casting from your laptop or android device if you're more into youtube or Netflix shows. Shout-out to the manager on duty Daryl Goh for the warm welcome and exceptional service! We would be happy to return in the future.

title: best location, hygiene
desc: The location is strategic, it,s centralized and near to everywhere, you needed. the hotel room is unique and has a good concept, the towel is not replaced by a new one, even if it,s already changed to a new day.

title: Excellent Service
desc: Excellent service provided by Daryl at Hotel G, was welcomed and greeted by him with a smile and explained clearly the details of the stay and was enthusiastic providing the service. The room is comfortable and relaxing.

title: not recommended
desc: the location is good but rooms are very very small, probably 4-5 meter sq. the lifts are super slow and you need to wait a long time to go down/up. not recommened for longer stays but is a decent place for one night.

title: Good Stay
desc: My 3rd stay in Hotel G. Served by friendly staff Aiman and was happy to receive my first free room upgrade here. Staff was fast and efficient. The room was a lot bigger than the standard room. Basic but comfortable. Only down side is there is no mini refrigerator. Location is convenient. Overall, quite satisfied.

title: Great customer service and chic room.
desc: I would like to highly commend Mr. Daryl who helped us check in before the check-in time due to our flight arriving earlier than expected. The check-in process was quick and professional. Our room package includes free burgers and room decorations which Mr. Daryl informed right from check-in. He also gave us a bottle of red wine, I'm not sure if that's part of the package or it was complimentary by him but we highly appreciated it. Our room was a King size bed, the room is compact. Just enough to open a large-size luggage but will need to close it back up to have any walking space. The room is fully equipped with all the amenities you can want. The location of the hotel is within a few minutes of the closest MRT station and is surrounded by many good local restaurants. Highly

title: Satisfied with our stay
desc: 4-night stay; 3 adults in adjacent double & single rooms (sold as family room) Upside: (1) Downtown location - walking distance to Orchard Road, Little India, Bugis, etc.; two MRT (subway) stations nearby (2) Reasonable rate for family room - 2 adjacent rooms each with comfortable beds (queen & single, respectively), efficient air-conditioning, rainforest showers in each bathroom with forceful water pressure, quality toiletries and good soundproofing; breakfast for 3 included in rate (3) Small gym - due to Covid, need to reserve ahead for a 1-hour slot (max 4 users) and pick up keycard from reception (4) Food options right downstairs - went to the French restaurant for breakfast and for reasonably priced wines one evening, and to the Mamak (Indian-Muslim) 24-hour diner for a

title: recommended!
desc: Came here solo for a business trip. Very strategic place, easy to find (I took MRT) for someone who is not familiar with Singapore. Lots of good food in the neighborhood! Room is small but quite cozy. Hospitality is nice! Recommended, I would say.

title: Very disappointed. Hotel provide expired body lotion (Feb 2022) to guests. Good location but rooms are very small.
desc: Good - located at strategic location. Hotel reception staff are quite friendly. Bad- initially I stayed at Good room for one night, then upgraded to Great Room that is slightly bigger. Still find the rooms very small and not sound proof. I am very disappointed that the hotel provided expired Body lotion to guests. Realised it when I got back home as I took it home since I used it halfway. I have attached the photos. The pillows smell so would suggest the hotel air the pillows outdoor or sanitized it.

title: Excellent customer service
desc: Me and my hubby were checked in hotel G and stayed for one night to celebrate my birthday, served by staff named ttani, she was so patient and nice, got a free upgrade and one bottle of red wine cos of my birthday, will visit here again definitely!

title: Honeymoon trip
desc: We booked 3 nights at Hotel G (a 4 star hotel) room type queen bed when we were back in Cairo but when we arrived and the receptionist ( her name is Hema) knew that we were on our honeymoon trip, she upgraded our room type to king bedroom. She was amazing and super friendly, helped us with a lot of attractions booking. Hotel is at a central location next to a lot of 24/7 open restaurants and supermarkets so we had an amazing experience trying out lots of cuisines (turkish, thai, indian, vietnamese, chinese) and there is like a bar (couple of bars) corner which is open till late (3 am). The room is a bit small though but everything is clean and super cozy. You can also use their restaurant which is pretty good and affordable even if you didnt book any food in advance.

title: Friends Staycation
desc: Did a staycation with my friend on their Linger Longer promo which is a two-night stay in their Good Room. It was bundled with 25 Degrees‚Äô (the restaurant downstairs) It Takes Two box which includes 2 Signature Burgers and 1 side. Room + Amenities: The room was comfy enough for two petite ladies like us! Interesting layout where the sink was outside the toilet. They use fancy METIS brand soaps which smell good! There's no wardrobe in this room though so you'll have to hang your clothes by the mirror at the entrance where there's only 4 hangers. Food: Only comment for the burger combo we had that was included in our promo package was that the fries tasted a little stale. Otherwise, the burgers themselves were pretty decent! Service: Staff were super friendly and accommodated

title: Fantastic location
desc: Stayed at this hotel for 3 nights from the 15th June, the hotel is in a good location with loads of shops, restaurants and markets nearby. We ate in both restaurants located under the hotel as if you are a guest you can have a discount, food really good in both. Our room was spotless we were on the 6th floor in 0632, the room itself is very small but we knew that before we arrived so wasnt much of a shock, we did joke that the pictures made the room look huge, all basics in the room and really comfy bed with quilted mattress protector which always makes a difference, they have a green policy so wont clean the room the day after you arrive unless you request it which i think is quite a good idea, overall really good experience and would definately stay here again

title: Cosy stay
desc: Consider for the price (please look out for their promotion packages from their own website), location and service, overall staying at Hotel G make us feel comfortable and relax. Daryl Goh who serve us, also impress us with his excellent pride service which he initial to upgrade our queen size bedroom to 2 single beds without any charge, explaining that it is much more convenience for my mum to walk about during the night which is true and really thoughtful of him. He also did an early check in for us and explaining everything in detail. It did make our stay more enjoyable. We definitely will be back üòä

title: second time... there will not be a third for sure!
desc: This was our 2ns time at this hotel. We brought friends along as being quite reasonable prices and location is great. We thought that after 2 years closed because of COVID the hotel.should be spotless clean, but no. It is worst than last time we came. Shower has mold, rust spots and dust everywhere. The curtain blinds id the room were full of dust, we opened them and a cloud of dust flew.over our heads. As we came with friends and we had in total 3 rooms we dis also check.whith them, same story in the bathroom and the room. But most important and to underline is that when you check in they inform they wont clean the room daily unless you stay 3 consecutive nights!!! it was a definitely "no" for us all. We got the room clean daily at least. The restaurants have good vibes and

title: Good for a short couple weekend getaway
desc: Room is pretty small but we came to just chill and have a "couple-time. The room is pretty clean and reasonable for the price paid. A Good Room Queen is all we need for a couple getaway and the location is great. Nearest MRT station is Bencoolen - a stone throw away and there are many eateries around it. Will consider coming back soon.

title: Pleasant experience in Singapore
desc: Hotel manage Darryl is very friendly. We got a room upgrade and late checkout. Room was clean, bed had very good mattress. Hotel offers good value for money. Centric location. We will come back for sure.

title: very small room & very bad service
desc: smallest room, very bad service, bed size too small, no space to move around in the room, wash basin planned outside toilet. do not go with the pictures in any of the booking site, everything is wrong.

title: Excellent service rendered
desc: Top notch service provided from when we check in to when we left. Daryl, the senior duty manager, was the one who checked us in. He was friendly and pleasant, explaining all the check in procedures patiently. Love the excellent service he provided and truly a gem to the industry and the hotel. Keep it up!‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Staycay at Hotel G
desc: Overall is good! Staff was friendly and had a free upgrade of the room. The staff was also very quick to response to our request (e.g. new toilet rolls) However, the master button to switch off the lights was not working. There was no shower curtain in the toilet.

title: Dysfunctional establishment geared to facilitate the management not the customer!
desc: This is a dysfunctional establishment which appears to be run to facilitate the the management not the customer! Different facilities like Ginett and 25¬∞ are open at different times on different days. You also have to book well in advance for Ginett (during my 6 night stay I was unable to secure a table in the restaurant). The various parts of the ‚Äòhotel‚Äô are dysfunctional with each other as I was unable to book the restaurant at reception for Tuesday when Ginett was closed on a Monday! I have numerous other examples but since I suspect the management would not be interested I will not waste my time

title: Great accomodation, amazing service!
desc: Been to Hotel G many times before, always loved how unique and homely the rooms felt. Our recent stay was a step above, partly due to the amazing service by Daryl the hotel manager. He made sure all our needs were met and made the check in process as seamless as possible (didn't even take more than 2 minutes to get our keys). Was pleasantly surprised when he offered to upgrade us to a bigger and better room and extended our check out timing. Would definitely come here again! Thanks Daryl once again if you see this!

title: Best service and staycation
desc: The front desk employees are friendly and helpful. Really tries their best to provide you with the best service. The room is clean and cosy. Convenient location and many good foods nearby. Recommended to stay here!

title: Good hotel for the price
desc: Have stayed many times when visiting Singapore. Very inventive services - I always feel like they think of everything. The staff are also very friendly and helpful even when I asked about some quite complex situations. Only thing that isn't great is you have to walk through a trendy restaurant to get to the entrance so it can be kind of awkward. Otherwise great place.

title: Disappointing
desc: The rug in the hallway looks like it had its day, and the smell adds to that feeling. The gym is advertised to be open 24/7 but it's not. You have to get an appointment from the receptionist and he (Mr. Luke) insisted it is not open before 6am. No room for negotiation. Basta. For a 4 Star hotel one would expect a bottle of water in the room, or a shaving set, or maybe both. But neither is available. Had to go to the reception 3 times until they finally managed to get my card key working. Yeah, nah, this hotel is a let down.

title: Poor Quality Hotel
desc: Rooms are really tiny, yet expensive. Not for business people, very poor service, limited facilities. if on a very low budget, just OK, otherwise look for better hotel. Few good staff, other dont listen. Breakfast menu poor.

title: Lovely room and service
desc: Spent a night with great air-con and comfortable bed. Check in was smooth and staff were friendly. Had a lovely clean room and even after I checked out, calling for help was easy when I left my item behind. Great surroundings too with many food choices at Fortune Centre. Will return again.

title: Breakfast not recommended
desc: The location is nice! Breakfast is not recommended! I regretted to eat breakfast in the hotel! If can, better eat at toast box near by. The hotel not very sound proof. The hotel plays music at the hallway but I can hear it in the room. Very annoying if you want to sleep off late.

title: Not Perfect, But Decent Nonetheless
desc: Stayed at this hotel for 4 nights for a work trip. Room was on the small side, but very clean, comfortable, sleek, functional and well-designed to maximise the limited space. Common areas were in general a bit tight, including the car access area to the lobby on Level 2 (bigger cars might have difficulties coming up for pickup/drop-off). Staff service was excellent - friendly, helpful and welcoming. Breakfast provided was basic but of decent quality, and hotel guests are entitled to a discount at a connecting restaurant called 25 Degrees Burgers. Above all, the hotel is centrally located within close proximity to eateries and amenities, and only a short walk to Bencoolen MRT and Bugis area - really good location. Probably not good for families, more for work/solo trips. Overall

title: Not a place to return too
desc: It felt like we had arrived at a youth hostel, although the man at the desk was very pleasant, he had no knowledge of the area or tourist attraction. The room was a queen omg! It was tiny! No room to open the case nowhere to hang clothes, the shower when used soaked the whole room. Clothes felt damp. Unless you are a young backpacker or don‚Äôt mind roughing it give this hotel a wide birth. The only plus we‚Äôre good location and breakfast.

title: Decent Hotel, but not worth the money
desc: Excellent location. Very small rooms and not worth for the money. WiFi also an issue. Facilities were limited. Not even a place to hang your clothes. I had a Great King room and hence the desk for working was good. Wash basin outlet pipe was also clogging.

title: nice cozy room
desc: wish the space to king size bed in all direction was better. no concierge service i.e. you carry your own luggage! no pool - that was expected. staff was courteous and was very responsive. Breakfast was as expected.

title: Boutique hotel with professional front desk staff
desc: Very good training staff, fast and efficient. The atmosphere of the hotel is very chic. They do not have a decent lobby to access. If u have a suitcase to carry. U need to be aware the entrance. The front desk is in the second floor. It is better to access by taxi if u carry a big suitcase like me. Other than that very decent hotel

title: Very good place to stay
desc: The reception staff superb especially Yvonne has been very very helpful with all my questions and requests for assistance. I will be coming here next time I am Singapore. Good service /good facilities and good value for money. regards Ian

title: Amazing stay and staff!
desc: We stayed at Hotel G Singapore for a couple of nights and everything was excellent!! The Manager Daryl was super nice and providing us with an excellent service at all times! The staff, the stay, the location... Everything was perfect! We will come back for sure!

title: Quality Service!
desc: My second visit to this hotel. Darryl was very welcoming and provided tip top hospitality to me and my friends. He handled to our requests and needs very attentively and tried his best to accord - was given a room upgrade & also welcome drinks voucher from Ginett! Reservation Haziqah also provided seamless and easy booking! Kudos to the team @ Hotel G!

title: stayed 10 nights having everyday same breakfast.
desc: room is very basic. for long stay the cleaner doesnot clean the room properly. glass, mugs and floors are dirty even after room service. the complementary stuffs in the room were not top up regularly. for short stay or one night stay probably good option. Breakfast has no varities having everyday same menu. location wise good as it is close to bugis and bencoolen MRT.

title: Three Night Couples Stay
desc: This hotel is perfect if you want to explore the city for most of the day and you are not spending much time in your accomodation. It is clean & modern. There is a very nice bar with reasonable wine prices at the ground floor and it also has a burger restaurant which also seemed reasonably priced. Bencoolen MRT Station is a short walk and connects with all the main MRT stations including Bayfront. The breakfast was buffet style and was perfect every morning. Only faults were the size of the room, which made it very difficult to even open a big suitcase and also the lifts are very slow. Overall ideal for city explorers looking for somewhere to rest their heads at night.

title: This place is like chocolate coated dog crap....looks good but really isnt.
desc: This hotel is cute but tiny. I would never stay here again. The service is very average, beds are ok but the room is very very small. 2.5 meters by 2.5 meters in the sleeping area. I wanted to leave as I had other places to go but was told I will not get a refund this was not advised in advance. Beware this place is like chocolate coated dog crap.... Looks great on the outside but has a nasty surprise when you look inside. I hope they go broke for being jerks.

title: Excellent Stay and Room and Location
desc: am a first coming to G Hotel Interesting entrance great ambience early check in at 1PM warm staff perfect for solo traveller location is close to MRT and bus station - reasonable price full amenities is provided will definitively come back to G hotel!

title: Very Senior Friendly
desc: 18-20 Jul 2022-someone in the family was tested positive, to protect our 2 elderlies, we had to house them in a hotel.. turned out Hotel G was an excellent choice! Reception staff Ms Nana offered us a room fitted w senior friendly amenities - seat in shower area, grab bars in the toilet, low bed for easie movement, spacious room to accommodate wheelchair. Ms Natalie was so kind to fulfil our requests to get meals to their room on time and even get vegetarian meals for 1 of them who‚Äôs vegetarian. Mr Matthew was ever so friendly greeting us w smiles behind his mask each time we approached the counter. The housekeeping staff were excellent very prompt in cleaning up the room. Great Thanks! again to all staff at Hotel G! Keep up the wonderful service to those in need!! üòÑüëç

title: Pleasant experience
desc: Overall a pleasant experience given the price. Good location with easy access to nearby shopping malls. Bed was comfortable. Special shout-out to Pauline for her honesty and for a job well done. Room was clean and neat. Thanks.

title: Pleasant Stay in a Convenient Location
desc: I checked in a night after my business partner came and it was tremendously smooth and easy despite arriving at past 1am. The corrodors were a bit tight but enough for a full-sized hotel trolley to pass. Room is budget-sized, we booked 2 single beds. Toilet is just right for budget travellers, no bidet, but quality of fixtures and toiletries is above average with the rainshower option. Location is very convenient: - a block away from Bencoleen MRT Stn - a few blocks from Bugis shopping malls and the market - popular bar downstairs - neighnorhood food stalls nearby Breakfast option is the bomb! You can get East Asian and contemporary options with quality espresso too! The Duty Managers are divine with their personalized attention to us especially with several oversized

title: Singapore is expensive, the Hotel G is probably as good as it gets at the budget end of the market.
desc: Good location, very close to Bugis, 15 minute walk to Little India, 200 metres to the MRT entrance on Bencoolen St. The check in staff are very helpful. Interesting decor, I'd call it funky industrial. The rooms (numbers 11 and up on each floor) are unusually long and skinny, maybe 8 metres long and 2 metres wide but after an initial WTF you find it works quite well. Avoid rooms 01, a very small and cramped double, and rooms 02 an even smaller and more cramped single. Everything is very clean, the shower is hot, the bed is good. There are no fridges but an ice bucket is available from the bar downstairs.

title: Clean and Convenience, small hotel with everything you need.
desc: The hotel is in nice area, close to MRT station. Reception staff, Matthew is very friendly and helpful. Good service. Room is small but have everything you need, clean and chic decor. Best match for those who looking for nice place to stay but spend a lot of time explore the city.

title: 4-star hotel?
desc: Although the hotel is offered as a 4* it is not true. The rooms are very small and mine specifically, was a double one and one roomate has, at its side, the wall. Teo middle bags cannot be opened at the same time inside the room. The sink is outside the bathroom and the wc and the shower are together, with no separation so when you shower, the floor and the wc get wet. The breakfast (in level 1) is ok, but if you go 15 minutes before closing, they start removing the food. The reception is located on the 2nd floor.

title: Functional and Efficient!
desc: Very good location with two MRT stations within walking distance. Good working desk. I already knew that the room size was on the small size so this wasn't an issue. Prob could have done with more power charging points (only 2 in one room).

title: Dissapointing alternative to hotel.
desc: Is bit hipster/rundown backpackers hostel asking money on level of real hotel. Rooms are interestingly decorated, but very very small. Management is not really trustwothy. Our group left hotel early after first night and booked in much better and convenient IBIS nearby.

title: Comfy, great location and clean.
desc: We had an excellent 6d. stay at Hotel G. Some people complain about the small room size but hey, you are in Singapore! Everything is tidy & clean with an outstanding service by the front desk staff - especially Matthew! Very convenient location with good restaurants around the corner: from tasty paratas, 24/7 great Thai food and great 25 Degrees hamburgers to a succulent steak am√©ricain at Ginett. Discount for hotel guests at Ginett and 25 Degrees.

title: Would recommend
desc: So far so good! Nana did a great job of checking us early and getting us a room after a long flight!!! It is a very clean and modern hotel in a good part of town. Would recommend this for solo and couple travellers, maybe a bit small for families depending on the room

title: Good Location!
desc: Good location! Walking distance to Bugis and Plaza Singapura. Full of local hawker centre and restaurants around the area. Good for foodies to hunt the local food. Rooms were small but clean and front desk staff wasn't friendly. Overall its one of the best location that I have stayed in Singapore hotels. Rooms for improvement!

title: Great Hotel, Service and near from Bugis and also MRT
desc: - Hotel was great - The staff is very polite, and helpful and clearly explained about the details. - Very clean - Room interior very nice - Breakfast great! - Was staying for 3 night, and very near from business district - Would come back for sure!

title: Helpfull staff, good location
desc: Good location, excelent breakfast. The staff were very helpfull. Aisha on reception even took the trouble to help us find the train station and advise us on where to visit on our two day break. The room was small but clean and had all the facilities we required.

title: ginett
desc: dined at ginett with my family for a birthday celebration. ambience and atmosphere was nice and warm. The staff working there was amazing, elevated our dining experience with their attention for details.

title: Comfortable, clean rooms
desc: We really enjoyed staying in Hotel G. Room was small but comfy and clean. We had a view to Marina Bay Hotel üëç. Wifi worked great. Good location, metro nearby. Full respect and thanks to Matthew who was very helpful and supportive, early check-in was allowed by him. Recommended!

title: Hotel G Stay was great!
desc: Our receptionist Matthew was awesome! He was very helpful and kind. We checked in our bags in our bags and checked in to our rooms early. They were kind enough to help us out even though check in was 2 hours from then. Room was nice, clean and affordable! Will definitely stay here again when I come back!

title: Excellent service
desc: so far it has been quite a pleasant stay. staff have been exceptionally accommodating to my requests. special thanks to kalai and ziwei for agreeing to bring a cake up to my room as a surprise! i really appreciate it, and will definitely be back :)) i highly recommend this hotel.

title: Great Location, Great Breakfast, Great Stay
desc: My friend and I really enjoyed our stay at Hotel G. We found the location to be very central and only a short walk from unique neighborhoods, restaurants, bars, and shopping malls. We were also able to easily walk to Marina Bay Sands and the Gardens by the Bay. And it is close to three or four metro stops (on different lines) making public transport really easy. The room is very sensibly laid out, with cute touches, a comfy bed, and a waterfall shower. Breakfast is also fantastic; with a wide range of choices (local, international, and ‚Äòwestern‚Äô - the lentil dal is especially amazing). The staff is also great - especially Matthew at the front desk, who made us feel very welcome at check in.

title: Wouldn‚Äôt choose this hotel again
desc: Rooms were very small and not what I expected. Shower and toilet share the same space (literally you could showers while using the toilet). I have stayed in a number of other properties in Singapore in a similar price range and this was my least favorite. I also am not as fond of the neighborhood.

title: First time in Singapore
desc: Tristan at reception was a nice guy, room was small with a large bed but with a good view out of the window, everything was clean and tidy. Good location, planty of shopping and dinning places around.

title: Lovely stay.
desc: We loved this place! We arrived late from the airport, so for everything to run smoothly and be in our room quickly was a relief. And what a cute room it was: remarkable use of available space meant that even though it was very small and could easily have felt cramped, it was instead like having a secret room all to ourselves. Mattress and linen are comfortable and good quality, bathroom, shower and towels are all very good. My personal highlight was the lampshade that sent lovely shadows around the walls. Late checkout was also very good, as we had time for leisurely wake up, breakfast (missed the hotel breakfast but it looked good on the menu), and a quick walk before heading away.

title: OK for a short stay
desc: Room was clean, but very, very small, if you are tall, you won‚Äôt fit in the bed, which is wall to wall. No towels or water in the gym, which is really unusual and not very convenient. The gym is also small and operates on a reservation basis, also not convenient and is not 24hr. Onsite restaurants are very busy, with no priority given to hotel guests. Staff are ok, but not flexible, I wanted to reduce my stay by one night and was refused as the hotel was fully booked, which doesn‚Äôt really make sense as they could (and likely will) resell my room. Expensive for what it is, make sure you book through a third party site and not direct as I did. I paid $200 plus SGD per night and could have paid half that through hotel.com, which I only realised later.

title: Business Trip Nov 29
desc: The hotel G Singapore was best choice for me because its room was comfortable. Though the space of room was a bit of confined for 2 parson, it was enough for a person. the hotel staff were kind and speak English.So,if you don't understand Mandarin, you don't worry on language.

title: Awesome experience
desc: The pillows were the fluffiest...breakfast menu had lot of choices...hotel staff was mostly courteous and helpful..super clean and value for money...would definitely recommend it to my friends and family members!

title: Good hotel but improvements can be done
desc: Clean hotel. Easy train ride from airport and easy to get around too. That‚Äôs all the good things. I had the issues with the keycard second night. Went up to room and can‚Äôt open the door then came down (1st time) to reset the card. Then up again and came down to replace the card (2nd time). Tried the new card didn‚Äôt work and back to reception to try to regenerate the card (3rd time). Then it didn‚Äôt work and down for the 4th time. Finally concluded that it must be the battery. Ask how long I have to wait. However technician is quick to respond in 10 mins but after 4 times up and down the floors. Another issue is DND/MUR sign. In most hotel, one side is dnd and the other is mur. But this hotel has one side dnd in English and another is DND in Chinese. How non Chinese speaker

title: Great
desc: We loved our stay at Hotel G. The staff were friendly, the location was great for Singapore buzz, transport links and great restaurants. The rooms were spotless and it was the comfiest bed we‚Äôd slept in at any hotel. The room was a bit small for travellers with big backpacks so would recommend staying for a night or two.

title: The space quite small
desc: Stay for 4 day and the check in counter is at 2nd floor. The room is quite small, the toilet also very small‚Ä¶.. but the hotel design is nice. Below have restaurant and around the hotel have many delicious food. The location is good but need walk 10min from bugis mrt station.

title: The hotel is not flexible on the check in, which is disappointing üòû
desc: The hotel manager was very indifferent to our request to either give us a room to check in or just for an hour to change in a formal dress suit for the show. He flatly refused. I travel all over the world and many a times the hotels understand your situation and help. I should have given only 2 stars but the check in guy was polite and nice!

title: Cozy and comfortable stay
desc: I had a wonderful experience at Hotel G, the room was clean and chic. The staff was really friendly, especially the manager Yvonne, she was very helpful with our check-in and check-out, we felt very comfortable throughout our stay and will definitely come back again! The location was centrally located and is very convenient to travel to the town area, there‚Äôs also a lot of food places and shopping malls around the area.

title: Alexander's Adventures
desc: We we were put in the tiniest room, had to climb over eachother to get to the bathroom, so very helpful when asked for twin beds, and w e got to stay until 6 for checkout, thanks Matthew. Close to shops, food outlets and markets. Probably best suit younger people.

title: Good place to stay
desc: Clean place, good location, very good experience. They have a good price cafe and bar downstairs. Staffs here are friendly and repect guests. Check in is effective and we checked in earlier. Good place to try.

title: Very nice
desc: Staff are very attentive and the whole place is super clean and comfortable. Only issue was the storage space was very hard for a 2 week stay with 2 people amd had to get creative to have a liveable space.

title: OK for a short stay! One night is enough for me.
desc: small room especially the tiny washbasin. The room is clean, in a convenient location. Only 2 plugs in the room! I stay on the high floor, king-size bed. Quiet and a safe choice for a short stay. Good design and fashion. It should be good for young couples.

title: Good place to visit
desc: the size of the room is right and clean. Also the staff is very kind and cleans every day. i will be stay more than one week. but i feel very comfortable.I hope that the rest of the stays the same. thanks

title: Best arrival experience. Fast and friendly services with great attitudes . Super cozy and stylish room. Love it here.
desc: Best arrival experience even I have arrived late night at 1 am. The front desk ( forgot to get his name) provides me with fast and friendly services with great attitudes. Understanding customer. Super cozy and stylish room. Good location so convenient to go around and to get local food at late night. Love it here.

title: great place good services
desc: lam is a great housekeeper that tend to our needs, really recommend for short or mid stay, room is clean and nice. enjoy our stay here, bottle water is unique. nice food around. love the burger downstair

title: So Comfy and clean
desc: House keeping Lam is so helpfull. The room so clean and comfy. If you go to Hotel G just call the house keeping to help you clean the room. My child was so happy. We live about 10 day at this Hotel. Thank you

title: Great Boutique Hotel
desc: 2nd time back to Hotel G, reception staff are very helpful to answer questions you may have for Singapore and if they do not have the answer, they will search online to find out for you, the hotel room is very clean, Lam is our house keeper during our stay, he always make sure our room well stocked with clean towel, boxed drinking water and other amenties. We appreciated the hospitality provided from all the hotel staff we encountered, make our stay feel like home, the location is also a plus, shopping malls within 5 mins walking distance, lots of food options around the clock, close to MRT station and several bus lines. Price is also reasonable and easy for Grab and Taxi pick up and drop off.

title: Staycation at Hotel G
desc: Went to Staycation with my parents. The staffs are very friendly and helpful. They were nice to allow us for early check-in as soon as the room were available. As there were two rooms, the staffs kindly gave us adjacent rooms and we were given high floors (at lvl 15). I would also like to commend the housekeeping staff Lam. He is very polite and attentive to the cleanliness of the room. We were still in the room when he happened to come for house keeping, and he nicely informed us to come back later. When we returned, the room has been neatly arranged and new towels & toiletries were replenished. Overall, it is a pleasant stay! üòä

title: Good location and room
desc: Hotel was in a central location with lots of transit, shopping and food option within 10min walking distance. Front desk was quick and helpful. Housekeeping was really friendly and did a good job cleaning the rooms. Rooms are a little on the small side but still comfortable

title: Great hotel so far
desc: Desk staff was very professional and friendly. I talked with Daryl who was very helpful. the hotel plus rooms have an artsy decor which is cool. Only cons would be size of the room and the window, both of which were somewhat small.

title: Great location and kind staff
desc: The location is just 3 min away from MRT and bus stops. There is a lot of nice restaurant and good food just in walking distance. The staff Riza is so kind and helpful. Keep your service and smiles. Definitely be back

title: Perfect Hotel for Business Trip
desc: This is 2nd stay here in 2022. Going to be my 1st choice for my next business trip to Singapore. Location are just perfect, 5 mins walk to Bencoolen Station, plenty option of foods, And the room is just perfect for rest after work and leisure.

title: Not recommended for business travellers
desc: Average hotel, rooms are extremely small but clean. Expensive given that it does not have the perks of a larger hotel chain. Gym visits had to be booked, which was inconvenient and pointless if people didn‚Äôt show up. No work space in room, but silly free gift on check in. Very much a tourist hotel and not for business travellers

title: Cozy convenient stay in Bugis
desc: Tiny but cozy and convenient. Good vibe and a lot of good street food downstairs. Been here for 3 weeks and enjoyed every buffet breakfast in the morning. High food quality. Service also very timely and good. Special thanks to mr Lam for his friendliness to me and help on arranging the housekeeping and laundry.

title: Room
desc: Very clean. Housekeeping are kind. Reception are kind and willing to help. Traffic is convenient. Very close to MRT. Food is very convenient to obtain. Air condition is cool. All are perfect. Bed is comfortable.

title: enough in a very good location.
desc: Very very tiny. Literally 3 sides of the bed lean against the wall. But well equiped and well located if you are going to be all day outside its in the middle between little india, china town, orchard road. And everywhere walking. A little expensive for what it offers.

title: It's all G
desc: We are halfway through our trip, but the stay has been excellent. Staff are very helpful and friendly and will assist with anything. The housekeeping staff are also efficient. You feel taken care of.

title: C and T‚Ä¶ Cool and Trendy
desc: Clever room designs, even if on the small side but still comfortable and efficient. Helpful friendly and very polite staff help make the stay enjoyable. F & B not unlike Hotel G ‚Äòs Scarlett in Bangkok with an interesting French Restaurant plus great selection of French wines and cheeses appeal to the adventurous diners

title: Great Hotel..
desc: A great hotel with reasonable price in Singapore. Stayed two times, about 8 days. Bogis and Rocher MRT nearby. Good location for tourist as well. Walkable distance to Little India, Bogis, Arabic Street etc

title: Would not recommend this hotel
desc: the perfume or refresher use in their lobby and corridor, just TOO STRONG, Feel very dizzy for stand there check in or everytime wait for taxi, very uncomfortable experience.  lucky the room didn't have this kind of smell. The shower water is hot at the night , freaking cold water in every morning, complain made, still remain the same. Staying in this SGD 320 per night king size bed room for 4d3n. I would not recommend anyone to stay here.

title: Generally OK with good things and some flaws
desc: The room (queen-bedded) is really really tiny. There is good use of space but this cannot compensate for the claustrophobia. It is suitable for a business stay (read: little luggage) of one person only. Two persons and you'll be climbing all over each other and crashing into each other at every turn, and turning your body is the most you can do inside the cell -- yes, it is a cell rather than a room. The only place to put a medium-size luggage is a dedicated space under the bed. There is absolutely no place for a large luggage or if you have more than one luggage. Having said that, it is quite a comfortable place to sleep -- yes, only sleep, with the TV over the bed. Shower has no divider, so the whole tiny toilet is wet. Good toiletries -- shower gel, shampoo and conditioner --

title: Comfortable
desc: It is in a great location and staff are great and helpful. Rooms are small but keeping in mind it's in Singapore it makes sense, but still have a great view and very comfortable. The only small complain would be that the showers don't have a "divider" or bigger slope to stop the water from going all over the bathroom. Mainly to not have a wet floor where the toilet is. But don't think it's enough to rate Hotel G less than a 5. Would come again!

title: If you are Italians don't book this hotel
desc: The hotel is fine, and the staff is great BUT the rooms are not OK for Italians. Everything we are used to having in a hotel room seems a fantasy here. There is no cabinet, the room is clean but is claustrophobic, the bed is too short (I'm 185 cm) and since the bed takes exactly the width of the room, you hit the wall with your foot...So sorry but not anymore....no way

title: Good value hotel
desc: I stayed there after reading the good reviews they have. I think its hotel with good value of money. The room width is only 2 metres. Which is the lenght of the bed. However, all the furniture and the floor plan fit perfectly with the size of the room. The room was clean. Toilet and shower room were clean too. The breakfast is average. The selections and the taste just average. But the location gives lots of option to find local and international food. So no worries there. Like i said. Its good value

title: Super friendly staffs and excellent hospitality!
desc: Booked the staycation (3D 2N) package to celebrate my partner's birthday and even though it was a Good Room, it didn't felt small at all presumably because we were given a corner room. Ziwei & Jingkai decorated our room with balloons which gave my partner a pleasant surprise! The front desk staff offered to help keep my cake knowing that there's no fridge in the room and helped to receive the bouquet delivery on my behalf as I was pre-occupied. Appreciate the hospitality and super friendly staffs who answered to our calls almost immediately (call for iron and also our lunch). The Linger Longer Package is really attractive; comes with lunch box for 2 (caters to vegans too!) , complimentary wine and celebration box (with a film camera). There's complimentary late check-out at

title: Nice hotel. Awful breakfast.
desc: Cute hotel, small but comfortable rooms, well designed and clean. Avoid breakfast at all costs. Sitting on sticky tables and the food on offer - it‚Äôs truly dreadful. Nothing is hot, the weirdest of selections with zero local influence and what looks like packet eggs, plastic cheese, etc. You‚Äôre better off getting something local outside.

title: Quality of Service
desc: Response by Reception was almost instantaneous. They were very polite and courteous to support with all our requirements right from providing a Shower Curtain to providing ample quantity of drinking water . It‚Äôs ultimately the service that matters rather than brick & mortar . Breakfast Spread was fantastic. Would love to be there again .Keep it Up Team Hotel G . üôèüèªüôèüèªüôèüèª

title: Lights.
desc: The lights keep turning on and off for 3 nights in the hotel. It is not due to any supernatural issue but the electrical issue which the maintenance had to fix 3 times before it stopped. I have 2 sleepless nights in that room and the hotel does seem to offer a change of room for me. I will never go have to this hotel again.

title: Well Situated
desc: This hotel was great, it is right in the middle of all the action with lots to do within walking distance. The room was a bit small for the price but well kept and cozy. Slept well and felt taken care of.

title: Staycation
desc: Had a lovely staycation with Hotel G Singapore. It was my birthday and the guest relations officer, Zi Wei was so sweet to upgrade our room + gave us late check out. Overall, stay was good and would definitely come back!

title: Excellence housekeeping service
desc: Very good experience ~ Especially impressed by Lam‚Äôs housekeeping. Soon, clean and nice ! I think the hotel goes an extra mile to make customers feel at home. During the Christmas Day they also provided us with delicious and cute icecreams! Definitely a good experience!

title: Great stay at Hotel G
desc: Great experience, modern facilities, fantastic location in the vicinity of two MRT stations, friendly and helpful staff, reception is always available to help. Very clean housekeeping - credits to Lam and company

title: good location and helpful staff
desc: Great hotel with a good location. Friendly and helpful staff. Breakfast was diverse and yummy. Room was quite small but it was not a problem for us because we travelled with only hand luggage. The bar was also nice and cozy. Would recommend to everyone and will go there again if visiting Singapore.

title: Great Hotel
desc: I booked three rooms for three nights and we love this hotel. Great location - near Bencoolen and Rochor MRT station; lots of food choices nearby, and walking distance to shooping area (Bugis Junction and Plaza Singapura). The staffs are very helping, special thanks to Kalai who gave us early check in as compliment üëçüëç

title: Perfect for 1-2 nights
desc: If you are only staying in Singapore for a couple of nights this place is fantastic. If you are staying longer and Singapore is your primary vacation I would go ahead and splurge for a nicer hotel. The key here is VALUE. For what I paid and the short amount of time I was here it was an incredible value. I booked a Queen bed room. Although small it is fine for solo or couple. The bed & pillows were super comfortable. Rain shower had good pressure and consistent hot water. The room had blackout shades and I slept very well. I didn't use the gym or restaurant attached. The staff were very friendly. Can walk everywhere but a bit further to Marina Bay or Chinatown (only 10-15 min jog to Marina Bay which I recommend going around 6am to have it all to yourself). I highly recommend

title: Excellent Service
desc: I have wonderful experience staying at G hotel with my family. they‚Äôve tried their best to make us comfortable. They love their jobs. thanks to Debbi and all house keeping teams they‚Äôre love their job. Rooms are clean and well maintained, a bit troublesome if you want to pick up at hotel lobby due to their hotel entrance

title: Such an excellent hotel experience!
desc: I stayed at Hotel G for a few days and was checked in by Matthew at the front desk. He gave such warm, friendly, kind, and patient assistance, which I have never experienced at a hotel before! He helped me figure out where the best restaurants in Singapore are and even recommended a fun music festival to attend! Thanks to his assistance and recommendations, he helped me make my time in Singapore so memorable. For that, I will always be grateful for him! Hotel G provided a very comfortable and safe accommodation. I was thrilled with everything and couldn‚Äôt recommend this experience enough!

title: Perfect mix of price, service, hardware and location !
desc: Cozy, stylish place that you ll love stay after a full day of intense business conference and crazy parties, the highly accessible location just makes the whole package even better Affordable fee but absolute 5 star services from super friendly and helpful staff Special shout-out for my bro Daryl for being so professional in helping with everything i need during the stay

title: Good stays but the shower......
desc: Room a bit small. No mini fridge(sad). The pressure of the door closed from other rooms pretty scary, i got a shock it was so loud and the walls in my room shakes. Hahaha. Othe than that, i took a bath and the water flows out of the bathroom(refer to the photo attached). On top of that, friendly staffs, called housekeeping due to the mini floods in the room from the shower. I will like to compliment housekeeping Lam who attended the room service, he cleaned the waters, put extra towelsss on the floor to prevent the water to flow out again, he is also very friendly. Good job!!

title: Great service hotel G
desc: Satisfied by the great service provided by friendly staffs. Lam was very helpful. The hotel is located in the city Center with lots of restaurants around, fair price is also just around the corner. Recommended

title: Hotel G(reat)
desc: Very impressed with the service level from the staffs in front counter, we checked in with ease and felt comfy to ask the questions and got very helpful information. The room is well design and clean. Near MRT and food center.

title: Wife and I loved it.
desc: I was pleasantly surprised with the hotel and our room. Wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect really, but the only downside is the room is small. However, it was enough room for my wife and I, and the big King sized bed, great shower, clean modern room, and location is all very great. If you‚Äôre on the fence, book it. It‚Äôs a great hotel for this price range. Pro tips: - Fortune Centre across the street has some really great little hidden hawker stalls, especially the one on the 3rd floor we ate at (forget the name but it was busy and delicious). Also the dumpling guy hidden at the back of the 2nd floor had delicious dumplings‚Ä¶15 for $4! Do yourself a favour and wander around all the levels and pick a spot for cheap eats. -If you‚Äôre craving a burger the burger bar downstairs has really

title: No sound proof room
desc: My Neighbour is noisy .I feedback to front desk however the room beside me still noisy.They were watching football Noise from 11pm to 3am When I ask late check out till 3 pm and it was declined.Even I informed them about the noise. No sympathy from the front desk

title: small but clean
desc: very small location is good cleanvxclkV:DKf;k"SDKfl;skldksflkf;sdls'fldkgkkfdlf lgkgeotwr03awitoea'dljtergiui3t0[pikelfdklzfkdflkzdf'lkgdf ge'lsdml;sgd.,k'l;k'kkl;k;lk;lkp]of]seotktepoetop4\e[pt][erot][pert][ertp

title: Great location and clean
desc: Hotel great location, breakfast could be better but my room was kept really clean by the housekeeper Lam - thank you Lam . The rooms are small but comfy bed and good shower. Good gym but need to bring own towel and water Breakfast is on two levels so can easily miss items as the staff don‚Äôt inform you Will stay again

title: Would recommend
desc: We stayed in the good room queen which was a nice size for two people. I would recommend getting a bigger room if you have more luggages. We really enjoyed our stay. The staff from reception to housekeeping were all very friendly and helpful. The location was very nice. It was close to MRT station. There was a lot of good food options in the area.

title: Pleasant work from hotel experience
desc: Got the Good Room for 7am to 7pm as my own house is not available for stay-in that day. Room is small but is very cozy, clean and comfortable for a good rest, some self-study and work. Basic toiletries are provided. In room dining is available as takeaway from the 2 restaurants (Ginett and 25 degree) below the hotel if you do not wish to dine out. Room is not very soundproof but good enough for WFH and a short nap. Bed is comfortable but pillow is a little high. Overall satisfied with my short stay here as basically what you need for a short stay is well provided. Location of hotel is good too as it is a 3 mins walk from Bencoolen MRT station. Duration is also sufficient for a day's work. Will definitely book here again if there is a need again.

title: Stylish rooms
desc: Very clean and stylish rooms, loved the water in boxes and their claim to being green! Was disappointed with their standard 3pm check-in. Never in the world have I had check-in time exceed 2pm? I paid for breakfast but was not informed where to go, nor was it clear on the tv screen information. Would recommend this stay to anyone, but hotel procedures need improvement.

title: Dissapointed with Housekeeping
desc: The Hotel check is is fine but slow. The cup in our room was not cleaned and one of the towel smell. When we check in ,Our toilet bowl was not cleaned properly. Inform front desk however it take 4o minute for housekeeping to clean again the bath room

title: 5-star Service, Comfy Environment, Convenient Location
desc: Read the positive reviews and decided to try the hotel by booking an initial 2 nights. I super love the sunshine service of Bella who showed me around plus comfortable environment that I extended my stay by a further 9 nights. Am still presently a guest at the hotel and the service is truly what another reviewer described as a 4-star hotel but with 5-star service. Special thanks and shout out to Yvonne, Daryl, Nana and also Diana & Tan from reservations who embody what excellent service mindset is. Their cheerfulness, attentiveness and helpfulness have made my stay to-date a very pleasant one. As part of the hotel‚Äôs Green drive, guests need to request for Make Up Room when required which is great. I would like to commend Sheeba from housekeeping who greeted me warmly and

title: Little too small for us
desc: We found the rooms were extremely small and with the double bed in the corner, it meant climbing over each other. The rooms are very modern, clean, kettle with coffee and tea, hairdryer, the bed was very comfortable and the hotel was quiet. The location was ok. Very close to little India and about 2km from China town. We walked everywhere but the bus service was supposed to be very good.

title: Top class
desc: Stayed here in transit from Australia to Ireland Good value room However room was small but was perfect for our needs -rest Was allowed a complimentary late check out until 1pm As our flight was late at night our cases were kept safe at hotel Hotel is central and very near MTR stations Would highly recommend Book direct with hotel for best rates Debbie and her colleagues on the front desk were superb. Nothing was too much. Would stay again definitely Bravo

title: Bohemian, eclectic, fit-for-purpose hotel room, with a touch of Bay Area customer service
desc: This is part of a hotel chain, so you would be surprised to know it keeps a unique style that I may call bohemian, eclectic, and well-planned for short stays. The space is carefully dimensioned to your necessities as it is expected you will make your stay in Singapore outside of your hotel room. My husband and I have a preference for windows, so if you are booking these rooms be thoughtful that spaces are engineered for your necessities not for spending time inside. Therefore my only request was to have windows and I was certainly happy about this - my small room had two! I was well impressed by the bathroom too - in other hotels. You will find that they keep no distance between the shower and your loo, this one has plenty for a tiny bathroom. Great views and decoration,

title: Stylish hotel in a nice location
desc: Cant count how many times ive stayed in this hotel. The room is clean and very stylish. Our houskeeping mr.lam very accommodating and friendly when I request for extra pillow, water and vanity kits. Definitely will come back! <3

title: Costly but it's Singapore
desc: Be ready to open your wallet if you want to stay in Singapore for a visit! My room was 300$ per night after a 67% discount! I was allowed to ask for a big bed but did deal whit separated that an extra would a changed for the one I was suppose to have! Room is modern (A must with four stars) but very very small. The Bathroom is so little that the sink and mirror were placed outside of it! Maybe all the hotels are like that in the city where the spaces are rare? However, Hotel G is nicely situated in downtown. Absolutely no danger to go out at night. You can walk to see what Singapore have to proposed. MRT (subway) is eficient whit clear indications to find your way.

title: nice and economy hotel
desc: in the middle of the city with lots of restaurants and shopping mals close by. The gym is great. Lam from house keeping did a great job too. We enjoyed our stay in this hotel and i can really reccomend it

title: Great area and has all you need for a short stay
desc: This hotel is modern and clean, with several dining options and friendly staff. I felt well taken care of here. The room itself is compact but that‚Äôs par for the course in Singapore. I didn‚Äôt really like how the sink was in the main room but I understand that they need to optimize space. Definitely check out the French restaurant attached to the hotel - it‚Äôs a great place to work as well as eat

title: Great Budget Hotel
desc: Excellent budget hotel set in a good area of Singapore - very close to the bus stop, MRT lines and little India. Most tourist attractions walkable in a maximum of 10-30mins Hotel bar and restaurant full of locals and good vibe - food and drink ok. Hawker Albert great for cheap eats and plenty other decent restaurants close by

title: Clean%2C%20great%20location%2C%20good%20vibe.%20Room%20smaller%20than%20advertised.%20
desc: Overall really happy with this hotel. It was super clean, staff were helpful and location is great. The boutiquey bar and work space on the bottom floor creates a great vibe. My gripes are that the room is smaller than shown in pictures. It was fine for my purposes but if you want to stay awhile and unpack it could be tricky. Also internet was choppy but better in the bar.

title: Good place to stay in singapore
desc: Location was good, close to everywhere. Hotel room was relatively small for big travelers, but for couple like us, it‚Äôs a perfect place to stay. Check in process was quick. Room design was very unique and functional, yet still giving us some space to put our luggages. Things to note : if you come here with your luggages by car, make sure the driver drops you at level 2. A little hassle to find , but that‚Äôs where the lobby is located. I saw some people arrived here by car and the driver dropped them at level 1 (at the restaurant). There are few steps of stairs to the elevator alley so I think it‚Äôll be hard to carry the luggages up the stairs . Another thing to note, since this hotel goes green, instead of plastic water bottle, they give the water in milk box container. Love the

title: Hotel G
desc: The location is excellent! The hotel is new and modern. The rooms are a bit small. The bathroom has no shower curtain, so it gets very wet after shower. Water would flow out to the bedroom after shower. Room attendant Thi Thi was very good and took care of our room very well. Service is good.

title: I recommended for Solo trip only.
desc: The Room is narrow but it is clean and fresh. If you come solo just like me, it is suitable for you. If you are ming with your relationship it may be narrow. The place is situated at downtown and can go anywhere. The bar counter is very nice & hospitality.

title: Hip and sustainable hotel
desc: I thought the hotel was too cool for my taste because of the industrial interiors but the style grew on me during my stay. I like how it practiced sustainability with its water, shower supplies and linens. The breakfast is bot a must have though, since the selection is limited and you can find restaurants and cafes around. I will consider this hotel if I have a chance to come back!

title: Third time stay
desc: Third time around. Commin back for the third time says it all I think :-) Athough the rooms are small they are cleverjy designed . Everything you need is there ,Even for a business trip where I need a small desk to work .....

title: Lacks Function
desc: I started and ended my trip in Singapore, so I stayed here and Hotel Mi (nearby) during my time here. Hotel G has aesthetic but lacks function, whereas Mi is the opposite. At Hotel G, you will find a bunch of hipster and trendy decor that makes it more of a boutique hotel feel, but, in all that decor, it loses some function. My top complaint is that they lock the thermostat. I think 22 C was the minimum you could go. I called and ask and the excuse I got was that it would cause the electricity to go out. I suspect the hotel is just being cheap. The other complaint is that all the pillows are massively high. Even for side sleepers, it's like putting your head on a skyscraper. If you call down, they will find you a normal pillow, but I'm not sure if they think their clientele are

title: We are very happy with this hotel.
desc: We liked the hotel. It is small and cosy and adequate for us. Staff are very friendly and helpful. We asked for water and lotion and we were given more than we asked for. Room is small but nice and bed is very comfortable. Pillows were great! The shower is open to the toilet area and will get wet as Asian bathrooms go. Room service is as requested, whether to clean your room daily or not. This hotel's location is awesome. We walked everywhere. There is also a bar/eatery downstairs, and cheaper eats just round the corner.

title: We enjoyed our stay!
desc: My fianc√© and I enjoyed our stay at Hotel G! The manager Daryl, who received us, was very accommodating and even upgraded our bed from Queen to King size when he found out we were engaged. The room itself was very clean and spacious, very comfortable. All the room features were definitely up to par. I only hope that next time we stay over the water dispensers on each floor are available. But overall it was a pleasant experience. At checkout, the concierge, Debbie, even helped us by booking a Grab car for us to the airport. Thank you Hotel G!! Til next time! :)

title: Hotel G
desc: Good location ...nice brakefast....clean place . Housekeeping staff was great. Thank you Lam ! We found this hotel online.Reasonable price . At the beginning room felt a bit tiny, but we got used to it after first night. This is Singapore ....

title: Great
desc: Good ambience good for food n very near MRT BENCOLEN so I will recommended to my friend and family also so I will come back to stay again. Keep up the good work. You hard to find another hotel like this again. It‚Äôs my second stay at the hotel G with my family. Thanks

title: Great for a business trip
desc: Very happy with my overall experience and stay. Staff was welcoming and helpful. Super fast check-in/check-our process. Excellent arrangement for drop on/off location and easily reached by taxi (compared to usual traffic in the area). Rooms are fresh, modern, original and clean

title: Positive hotel experience.
desc: I will like to recommend housekeeper- Lam in taking pride in his work with great aptitude. Overall stay was pleasant and comfortable. Buffet breakfast spread is sufficient with tasty baked goods. Thank you, Hotel G.

title: Hotel G
desc: Staff is helpful and the room is clean, surrounding got alot of food choice, recommended for those who are looking for chinese food, there is a street who full of steamboat and chinese food to be serve

title: Great place
desc: We stayed for 3 nights , it was great, really close to underground, 30 minutes walk to marina bay and gardens by the bay. The room was super clean, breakfast has lots of options. I whole heartedly recommend. The gym is also good, there are a few machines, and at the ground floor there are plenty of restaurants and caffes

title: Amazing Stay, Definitely Will Come Back Again
desc: We stayed just for 3 days 2 nights at Hotel G Singapore. This is our first trip to Singapore for my birthday and honeymoon getaway, so we had very tight schedule. After made booking, I directly sent email to the hotel reservation and requested to have early check in around 12-1 PM. At first they said early check in is subject to availability due to the hotel is expecting high arrival on 17th Feb. Then 2 days before our check in date, I sent again our early check in request via Agoda apps. I was very happy because my room finally ready earlier upon our arrival time at 1:30PM. We was assisted by the Nana-the reception upon arrival and departure, she did great job, our check in and check out progress was express, and no queue at all. We booked for a Queen Bed Room, it's a very

title: Perfect location to discover all the main attractions Singapore has to offer.
desc: Location was perfect and quite easy to travel anywhere (MRT stations within 5 to 10 minutes walk, lots of buses nearby). The hotel is super clean, I really appreciated the Go Green policy (changing bed sheets or towels based on request). Staff was extremely friendly and professional. Breakfast was good with a nice selection of food. The room was functional and well equipped, beds were really comfortable and I had the longest sleep ever for a long time (or was that because of my daily 18km-walks? Lol). The restaurant was full every day for lunch or dinner, but didn‚Äôt go and eat there so I won‚Äôt judge, but looked really popular. This is not really a big thing and I assume this is Singapore standard: the size of the room. however again, very functional with all amenities and we

title: Cute hotel!
desc: Lovely hotel and Daryl & Hema were so nice at reception - very accommodating of my reservation snafu. The room is nice and clean; I love the hip decor and the dream catcher. Also super convenient to have a bar and restaurant downstairs. Would recommend!

title: Tiny tiny tiny rooms
desc: The room is clean. But it‚Äôs so small it‚Äôs almost comical. My head and feet hit the wall at the head and foot of the bed. No wardrobe. No space luggage. A few hangers on the wall across from the shower with no curtain or glass. So while you‚Äôre not directly over the toilet you are very close to being so. This would be horrible for a couple or a family. Just enough space to change your mind. But it‚Äôs clean and kinda cute.

title: Nice hotel
desc: Good services and good location. Near MRT and many restaurants nearby. Walkable distance to shopping malls. Nice decoration in the room, good for person to stay long or for business trip. Overall - good for value. Will come back again. üëçüëçüëçüëç

title: G Hotel Singapore " Lifestyle Hotel".
desc: It's been awhile since we finally traveled and it's Singapore as our destination. The hotel is situated in Bencoolen street which is surrounded by art institutes with a short walking distance to the bus stops, subway and 15 minutes walk to the tip of Orchard road Singapore Plaza. The rooms were small as we tried queen size and later two single beds room but it was cosy and most important are the friendly and helpful staff. There is no pool or gym but there are two very popular expat restaurant and bar on the ground level. One serving italian, wine and wide selections while the other is a popular burger outlet. The price for the accomodation is average by Singapore hotel rates standard and is almost in the heart of the city. Stay healthy !

title: Mr aymen and lam and thinesh .make my stay enjoyable
desc: Good place to stay good vibes and grwat housekeepers ( LAM THINESH ) .i totally enjiy mu stay here and for sure i ll come back,lication great reception guy mr aymen was very helpful too and the weather.....................................

title: Corry
desc: The hotel location is excellent, near to the shopping area, and surrounded by a good food. They have a great staff, efficient check in, clean and neat room. Hana the HK attendant is super friendly and generous she knows what she's doing. Smile everyday and passionly do her job every day! Cheers, Corry

title: Recommended for single or couple travelers
desc: Although the room is super small but it is very comfortable and enough for both of us. Recommended for single or couple travelers. Very near to 2 met stations. Lots of good food. Near shopping malls.

title: Mr.
desc: Very Nice hotel to stay with. Room is cozy and clean. Location is very strategic. Lots of good food around and also places to go. Near mrt station and bus stop. I will surely stay here again if visiting Singapore again.
