title: Water heater did not work at all.
desc: Water heater did not work at all. Had to take cold shower in the middle of night. It was not helpful at all by the hotel staff. No room change was offered on the night. Since need to check out early tomorrow, ask for help to fix it before, but was offered to take shower in another room if it has not been fixed by then. Imagine to take shower at another room at 5am?!!!

title: Aiman is the man!
desc: Aiman is an amazing human being! He was really helpful and kind to me and my girlfriend. I would say this is the staff that hold 5 stars hotel level, no even staff in 5 stars hotel can‚Äôt compare not even those from st Regis or four season

title: Hotel G for a day use stopover
desc: Hotel G was the best option for our 24 hour stop-over for linking flights out of Changi. The room we initially booked was very small so we opted to pay another $55 on top of the $185 for a bigger room. It was a durables room with 4 extra square meters of space. The alternative was to pay $140 dollars on top of the $185 for a suite. That would have been the better option. The disabled room has a very short double bed that is hard to access for one party. It has a shower head at a height for a wheelchair customer only and it has no black-out curtains. It is noisy too from wheels on hard surfaces with little sound damping.It has a really great restaurant /bistro downstairs with a really nice included breakfast. It dies not have a pool. Taxi access is good for a second floor entry.

title: Very small
desc: 180.00 a night for very small room and another 80 if u want to check in early.... That half the cost of a room to check in 5 hrs early Atleast the ac works well but don't think it's worth the price See pictures attached also will be doing a video on it

title: Hotel G
desc: Very unlike the photos you see on the internet. The room is very much smaller than the photos. Not much space for us to put our bags and things, only given one room card, when asked for another, we were told only one per room. Basin is clogged. Location is good though, plenty of food and drinks. Good for solo travel but still think it's too pricey for a small room. II will never stay here again. There are plenty of other hotels nearby.

title: Clean, efficient and ideally located at a great price.
desc: Spartan, clean and ideally located boutique vibe hotel. Perfect for one and a bit of a squeeze for two. The staff was friendly and helpful. In a place you want to be out and exploring, a clean comfortable room is the perfect fit. The shower/toilet is close quarters. Everything was compact and comforting. The location is perfect for walking to so many landmarks. And tons of great food just minutes away. A wonderful price point for clean, safe, haven to springboard into wonderful Singapore. Air conditioning at just the right temperature.

title: Review for Hotel G
desc: Good aesthetic hotel. Convenient Well taken care of by staff daryl, debbie, bella, howard. Toilet is clean, room is sound proof. Good to know there is a restaurant just below the hotel and there is in house guests discounts.

title: Great Stay, Wonderful Experience
desc: The room was really clean and neat, service provided was fabulous. Stayed for one night, didn‚Äôt explore much but the bed was comfortable and staffs were really nice Special mentions to these few for making my stay a wonderful one: daryl debbie bella howard yvonne shawatti

title: Happy Bruneian Traveller
desc: The stay felt luxurious to me. The cloud soft bed/pillows. The ambience. The entertainment interface on the TV. The space (I prefer a good distance from my bed to the bathroom). The rain shower. The boxed mineral water. The restaurants connected to the hotel were convenient and had a delectable selection of food (I would've liked to sample their menu if my stay was longer). Also, I had problems with my stay and the staff were kind and accommodating enough to arrange for my extension (three time requests!) at a good rate. I rarely write reviews unless they're worth the recommendation.

title: Wonderful and memorable Trip in üá∏üá¨
desc: G Hotel is the modern and comfortable hotel among all the hotels that I stayed. The room is tidy,clean and modernist. The location of the hotel is at the centre of busy place,Bugis. I also would like to compliment to all the staffs in G Hotel, special mention to Daryl,Dayana,Bella and Howard. Thank you for your hospitality service.

title: I'd go other hotels next time
desc: The entire room only has 1 plug that is next to a small work desk, my husband and I had to charge our phones, laptops, we also need to boil water, dry hair, only 1 plug in the room is very inconvenient. The room is tight, there's no space for opening two suitcases, no ironing facilities, no fridge, which is overall again inconvenient. The staff are friendly and it's in the middle of many shops and the location is very centered.

title: The Khin chronicles of Hotel G!
desc: We loved our stay at hotel G. The rooms are cozy but fun with friends! We stayed in a room with 2 single beds. We had clean towels and water every day! The standard of cleanliness is world class and the staff are super friendly and always happy to assist especially Khin!

title: Cosy and clean hotel
desc: First time staying in hotel g. Room is nicer than hotels nearby. Will recommend for a short stay. Room is on a smaller side. Service from the front line staff make up for the shortfall. Nice hotel to recommend

title: Good review
desc: The room is a little tight for us but good service from Thi Thi and Yin Yin. I will be staying for a few more days and I‚Äôm sure everything will be fine. Front fest service was very good as well. Thank you Guys!

title: Good, with room for improvement
desc: Centrally located, it‚Äôs not the first time that I spend some night here. There are some good as well as not so good points to mention. Good: Very comfortable and large bed (at least for my liking, I read some reviews complaining about ‚Äútoo tall‚Äù pillows, some other ‚Äútoo soft‚Äù mattress ‚Äì which I didn‚Äôt find to be so). Tap drinking water ‚Äì good enough for coffee or tea! Two USB direct charging stations, saves one socket for gadgets charging. Safe (in the bed frame), drawer style, easily accessible. Not so good: the sink is extremely tiny, quite unpractical to wash the face. There is no fridge in the room. On arrival, just out of the lift, there was some smell of smoke in the hallway of the room floor (my room was a no-smoking one, so I suppose that at least all the floor (if

title: Great stay
desc: We always stat in G when we were in the city. Clean, pretty much has all the things you need. Nice breakfast, however after staying for 4 nights it‚Äôs kinda boring to have same breakfast every day. Our room was squeaky clean, kudos to Lam, the housekeeping guy. Definitely will be back.

title: Personal Trip after three years of no travel
desc: At check in we were met by Michelle the GM and Howard, Front Office Manager who were exceedingly courteous, welcoming and helpful. I was helped to get started on my Apple Wallet as I did not know how to do it. The room is excellent, a request for extra water was fulfilled in a matter of minutes as was the changing of a bulb. We also had excellent service at breakfat with a big smile followed by delicious lunch at Ginette, Gayathiri and Azlina were exceedingly attentive and came back a few times to check on us. Food was great value and delicious I also went back to ask for help with Grab, I am clearly technically challenged and appreciated Howard's time again It really feels so nice to be in this big city and feel so comfortable and at home. I would love to come back again

title: Clean and comfy
desc: Pros: We stayed at the level where the rooms are attended by Riza. The room is super well kept with minimal dust (except for the oft missed out TV's extendable arm) and truly deserves the SG clean certification. Even their phone is clean and normally hotels' desk phones are grimy. Definitely impressed and thank you Riza for doing up the room so well! Room is spacious enough for 2 petite people. Eateries everywhere around and super short distance from the famous Chinese and Indian temple, and a short distance away from Bugis Street. They do have a gym on lvl 3, but you'll need to book time slot as max 2 people can access at any one time. Cons: We didn't like how one of the receptionist was super nice to the guest after us but treated us with impatience during check-in. The

title: Hotel in a good location but very small room
desc: Very good location near downtown and Bugis Junction But the hotel doesn‚Äôt have swimming pool Hotel needs to improve its cleanliness, some hair are still in the room Hotel room was very small for a 4 star hotel

title: Great Location and Great Staff
desc: Interesting design.... Location is amazing.... Staff are great.. .IN particular Ziwei, Bella and Aiman! Thanks for making this stay so relaxing..... Definitely come back here and would recommend to others...

title: Good services and good hospitality
desc: Staffs here are friendly and helpful. Even the housekeepers (especially Lam) are super helpful and polite too! Requests are attended after minutes and they always make sure my request is fulfilled. Thanks!

title: Nice hotel with friendly staff
desc: 2nd stay in hotel G Singapore! Tired the greater room this time round. Room is clean with helpful and cheerful front desk staff especially Aiman who assisted us with check in. Will recommend this hotel to my friends coming to Singapore

title: comfortable stay
desc: nice and comfortable room. had breakfast for 3 days. food is of good quality but hope for more variety. apart from that, stay Is comfortable with friendly and helpful front desk staff. will recommend this hotel

title: Nice place for a short stay
desc: Nice location, clean rooms and good restaurant. The large balcony in my upgraded room was a pleasant surprise. I do not have any hesitation in recommending this boutique hotel for short stays especially for single person, rooms bit smaller for double occupancy.

title: Great location
desc: Great location, walking distance from all main attractions, clean. cool merch (mugs, laundry bags). AC and mattress were perfect for great sleep and recovery grateful to have Rasbhinder as our housekeeper

title: Perfect location but our room was too compact for us
desc: Our stay was split into 2 due to our trip to Malaysia. First for a night followed by 6 nights second time. Check in both times was quick & easy. First time we had a wonderful & a very efficient receptionist Eiwie who checked us in & we were able to get an early complimentary check in. Thank you Eiwie! My only concerns were that the rooms were very compact & there was no space to walk around the double bed. My husband & I found that very difficult at our age therefore I have given 4 stars. There were no closets therefore our 2nd stay of 6 days was not so comfortable. Not enough room for our big suitcases. Apart from that the hotel is well located & very clean. Staff are polite & friendly.

title: Not recommended.
desc: I am visit for business trip. Once I arrive, the reception area is too small for even for 10 persons. Only single sofa. No space for resting. Reception is not gentle and Not polite. I checked 15:30 but room is not ready. Delay for 30 minutes. No phone call. I need to call back to check. Not recommended. I won't go back to this hotel anymore,

title: Great value hotel in a convenient location.
desc: Amazing location just minutes from Bencoolen MRT and easy to walk to many places of interest. Room was clean, bed large and mattress very comfortable. Although the room is compact it‚Äôs fine for one person. I liked the sink and mirror being in the room rather than the bathroom as meant that it wasn‚Äôt steamed up and hot from the shower when using it. The corridors/lift/reception area were a bit tired. Staff very friendly and helpful. Would‚Äôve been great to have water stations in the hotel as the room sink is too shallow to re fill a bottle.

title: GREAT EXPERIENCE STAY IN G HOTEL
desc: Pleasant stay, we spent 2 nights here, the service was great and amazing. Thanks Yvonne for the great customer services. The location is very strategic, i am sure will spend time in Hotel G very soon.

title: Hotel G was a great experience
desc: Nice staff "Nana" was great staff person. room was clean, and the staff was very helpful with information. Great water pressure, the smell of the room was nice. excellent mattresses were very comfortable. Nice pillows. Located near numerous restaurants. TV shows great pictures.

title: Premium customer assistance !
desc: The location of the hotel is perfect (work experience with meetings in and out of downtown). The athmosphere is relaxing. A special thank you for Daryl and Fifi for their so valable assistance in day-to-day practical challenges, and for their kindness.

title: What a nice cozy place
desc: living in 16 floor, good view and clean room, bed is small but comfortable. simple decoration and very suitable for young generation. its more like a cool student accommodation. you can find anything just go down stair.

title: Cozy Hotel
desc: A modern hotel in Singapore. We checked in late past mid-night & front desk was super friendly. Beds & pillows were soft & incredibly comfortable. Many places to see & eat within walking distance. Love the interior decor & art details. Price is affordable.

title: Love this hotel
desc: I love this cozy hotel , good location , near by city, when we check in our room got wifi connection issues, the staff here are very patient and help us to solve itü•∞ü•∞ (served by a Chinese lady) . Then the last day we met Fifi, she is very helpful and friendly , next time we will come to G hotel again.

title: Black Mold
desc: Room smelled of mold & impacted my breathing / sleeping. Effectively there is poor air circulation / humidity control in the hotel. Toilet lacks separation from the shower so it‚Äôs hard to avoid getting your clothing bottoms from getting wet.

title: The people are very nice . Especially FiFi Daryl
desc: The room is to small , no closet as it is a boutique hotel. Open shower. It‚Äôs an experience. Places were walking distance and accessible. Thanks to Daryl & FiFi for the great service. They recommended me to places.

title: Near bugis area,nice location and staff
desc: check in smooth and fast, Staff Fifi was helpul and nice. Hotel was clean and nice design, this is my 3rd times stay with Hotel G, love location, some food stall around also,mrt within 10minit, will be back soon.

title: Nice boutique hotel
desc: The hotel is trendy and clean. Thanks Rena for housekeeping our messy room. The hotel location is quite good. With tasty restaurants nearby. Can access to mrt for 3 different lines within 15 minutes.

title: Wonderful hotel location and friendly staffs at Hotel G
desc: We had a wonderful experience here. All staff members we had interacting with from the check- in to the cleaning staff were delightful and eager to help! Risa, the house keeper is so helpful. She is always ask and care if we need something. Thank you so much. When we come back to Singapore, we will always book Hotel G. And we will recommend to our friends. ü•∞üß∏‚ú®Ô∏è

title: Lam - The best house keeper in the world
desc: The housekeeper, Lam, was genuinely one of the kindest I have ever met. He has made the trip exceptional for us and really went the extra mile. This man deserves a promotion/raise and has been the best thing about the hotel

title: Great option
desc: Very comfortable, small rooms, but serviceable. Great location. Staff were very friendly and accommodating. Unfortunately early check in was hard to get, but understandable given how busy they looked.

title: Great experience
desc: The staff RAS for house keeping was very helpful and kind. She guided us really well Thankyou so much for the kind gesture A nice stay and comfortable. The room was super clean and all sorts of facilities were there. Thumbs up

title: Excellent service given by the front office staff
desc: Had a staycation recently with my friends at hotel g and the service provided by front office staff are always consistent and good throughout my stay. They are very friendly and are willing to go extra miles for their guest!! will definitely come back again!! special mention to daryl, debbie, bella , howard, yvonne and shawatti for assisting me throughout my stay!!

title: G for Gem
desc: I was attended to by Daryl. He was very friendly and attentive. The checkout out time is 10am if I‚Äôm not mistaken. He gave me a complimentary late checkout so that i could rest well as i only checked in at midnight which i appreciated very much. The hotel room is cute and quirky and complete with all the amenities. Bed is super comfy. The room size might be small for some but I‚Äôd definitely recommend it for couples or solo travellers. I can‚Äôt say much on transport as i had a friend drive me around. I did‚Äôt get to sample the breakfast as well as it was fasting month. Overall I had a very enjoyable stay.

title: Enjoy the vibe.
desc: Love the ambiance. Perferct for short stay. Check in was handled by Fifi was fast and efficient. Must visit again for next strip. Room was cozy and clean. Not too big but good for single traveller. Wifi service is fast. Personal VPN usage is encouraged.

title: Hope to be back already!
desc: I had a warm welcome at the lobby from the manager Daryl. Check in was a breeze, and I was impressed by Daryl‚Äôs prompt service and warm smile. The room is very cosy with the cove lighting and warm colours. The ceiling is high too, which really helps extend the space visually. I love the design of the room. The bed is wonderfully good, I slept like a baby through the night. Didn‚Äôt have time to check out the gym, but I hope to next time. Thanks for the great stay :)

title: great service
desc: The service was awesome! the staff greeted us very warmly and was very helpful. My boyfriend and I always choose Hotel G in sg! The hotel room is small but compact and cozy! everything you need is in the room and any other we need was just one call away to the front desk and they are very prompt with their service! during this stay, the staff named FiFi helped us smoothly with our check in and needs. Kudos to her! also, the location is accessible to many places too! really enjoyed the stay here all the time, we definitely will come back :)

title: Amazing Stay (Again)
desc: Amazing stay! The vibe was chill, staff were extremely friendly and the rooms were very clean! Although the rooms are slightly compact as compared to other hotels (I already knew about this prior to staying as I did my homework and checked), the rooms are tastefully designed and totally sufficient and cosy! For those who prefer a bigger room, you can opt for an upgrade at the reception for the Great or Greater rooms! Thank you Shawati, Bella, Natalie, Aiman and Debbie for making this stay a memorable one! Will be back definitely!

title: Great stay May 23-26th
desc: This was our first trip to Singapore and we LOVED the Hotel G. Great location - convenient to train and to things we wanted to do/see. The bed was comfortable for us. We liked the compact efficient style of the room, we are minimal travelers, prefer that style and prefer to focus on being out of the room and exploring the city. The breakfast was AMAZING. I couldn't believe it. There were buffet stations of all kinds of styles of food and fabulous coffee plus big windows to look out at the street while eating. The breakfast really set tone for our day and we started off each day so happy. Liked the two levels of the restaurant, nice layout. The staff at the desk was super friendly to us. Also, it was spotless clean. Convenient charging stations for phones in room, also a safe

title: Superb Service
desc: Had a wonderful staycation with husband and baby at Hotel G. We entered the hotel from the street at Level 1 in the evening. Entrance was just in between Ginett and 25 Degrees restaurant. Since we have a stroller, we didn‚Äôt use the stairs (left side) to go to the lift lobby. Instead, we used the manual lift (right side). Perfect for those having troubles with the stairs. Front Desk staffs Natalie and Yvonne are friendly and check in was quick and easy. We were assigned to a wheelchair friendly room and it is indeed spacious with a lowered bed. The staffs took the initiative to arrange for us a playpen and baby bath tub which is a kind gesture. Not sure who cleaned the room but he/she definitely did a great job! My baby loves the playpen and the bed so much. He slept soundly

title: Great Hotel for shot stay
desc: Great location in the Bencoolen area close to Little India. Fabulous bar. Hotel room on the small side, but everything you need is there. Took some choreography getting in and out of bed as two sides of the bed are against the wall. The shower is in the same room as the toilet so there is a constant wet floor. Good value for money and great for an overnight stay. Staff very helpful calling us taxis for the airport and even upgraded us to a larger king room. Breakfast was good and had the best hash browns I have ever eaten.

title: Good value hotel in a good location
desc: We enjoyed our stay at Hotel G. We were in a room on the top floor, which was good to have as we could here no outside or road noise from the room. The room is on the smaller side, but was big enough for the two of us. It was clean, quiet, and the beds were comfortable. Location is good, with a good amount of places to eat nearby, and a couple of subway stations within 10 minutes walk. The staff were friendly and overall the hotel is good value for money.

title: An Amazing 2 Days 1 Night Stay in Hotel G!
desc: I had an amazing stay here at Hotel G & it makes me want to come back again! During check-in, Front Desk staffs Daryl & Bella assisted me with my check-in. They were friendly & attention to detail as I needed some help around the area. Service was great! The room was spacious enough for 2, room amenities were sufficient & the TV allows screen-mirroring which is really convenient as it allows me to watch videos & play some music when I am in the room but it only works with Andriod phones. The bed was huge as I booked the Greater King room which is totally recommended if you love a spacious room! I ordered some take-aways from 25Degrees & the food was delicious! I had the 25D wings & other sides as well. Thank you staff Dinesh for his recommendations on what to order! On the

title: Clean room, good location, but could be better!
desc: The location is excellent ‚Äî Bencoolen station is a short walk away and it‚Äôs a walk away from Bugis. Other interesting places to go are a few train rides away, too. There are lots of places to eat around the hotel. The room was clean and new looking when we arrived. The hot water however wasn‚Äôt hot enough, and the room is quite small. There is also no bidet. The hotel doesn‚Äôt have a lobby and we had some difficulty locating where check in would be. Lam was our housekeeper who we encountered when we asked for room service, and he worked quickly and efficiently. He was also friendly and personable. This hotel is highly recommended for those who are traveling light and eager to discover places around Singapore while walking around.

title: Solo trip recommended
desc: I really have a nice stay here for my solo trip.. Thanks Shawati to show me the room before I‚Äôm checkin which I would like I‚Äôm really stay in the safety room. üòÜThe hotel really clean and feel relax to stay. Lastly Thanks for the hotel allowed me to check in early even late.. Love üíï

title: Wonderful living experience in G hotel
desc: I am self-guided tour from Taiwan ,this is my first time to be in SG.I saw this hotel got many like from the internet, after living here .I can say it's High CP and great service, if you are single traveler. highly recommend you to stay here for few day, small room with all function.

title: Noisy room - lack of hotel lobby/somewhere to sit
desc: The location of the hotel is good, it is walking distance between two MBT stations and close to the main sights we wanted to see. The room is also clean and tidy as well. The hotel is clean, however the rooms are so noisy! The first room, we were put next to the lift shaft so all day/night you can hear the lift clanging. We changed rooms after that. The second room we were in was on a lower level and we could hear EVERYTHING in the room before us. We didn't have the energy to change rooms again though as it would probably be the same issue again. I didn't realise how important it was to have a social space until I got to this hotel. When your room doesn't have any seats, it's nice to be able to sit SOMEWHERE that isn't a bar/restaurant and this hotel doesn't have it. It

title: Clean and good service.
desc: Hotel is clean, well maintained! Definitely will recommed to other friends. Service are good, check in fast. House keeping also very polite and fast service. I will come back again for my next travelling.

title: lovely hotel and lovely service
desc: lovely hotel and lovely service. excellent service from the housekeeper - syifa. they always change the bed cover and refill the water. such a nice hotel, even the room is quite small but like all the beautiful detail

title: We are coming back for sure G!
desc: We stayed here for almost a week and really felt comfortable throughout the stay! Warm and friendly reception staff and housekeeping. Rooms are tiny but cozy and comfortable. If you are staying with kids better to go for the greater room. I‚Äôd booked our stay with breakfast and it was a good spread indeed. Special thanks to Daryl for helping us till we boarded the taxi to airport. We are coming back soon üôÇ

title: Great hotel and excellent location. Good value
desc: Hotel G excellent location and room size was good in terms of size and comfort. The room facilities were clean and tidy. Special thanks to Lam who cleaned our room brillianty each day. We stayed for week and Lam was friendly and made sure we had everything we needed to make our stay enjoyable. He really kept our room clean.

title: Best Hotel
desc: It was a wonderful stay at this hotel, my wife and I enjoy every moment. The staff was amazing. The view was breathtaking. Thank you to the team for a safe and fun stay - Wishing you all a best work stay

title: Great stay with Hotel G
desc: Hotel G was always our number one choice! The service is beyond superb! The staff are so nice and approachable, Fifi (Front desk), Debbie (Front Desk) and Thi Thi (Room attendant) in particular, took very good care of us. We will definitely book this hotel again and surely recommend this to our friends and family who will visit Singapore.

title: Great service and Comfy stay
desc: Repeated visit to Hotel G Singapore as location is great! Super accessible to great food. Absolutely comfortable beds. Pillows are abit too thick this time. Service was also excellent from front desk staff Bella, Aiman & Nana. Thank you to the housekeeping team as well. Cant wait for the next stay!

title: Will stay again
desc: Hotel was busy when we visited. Slow waiting time for lift. However, we like the rooms. Front desk was friendly. Rooms were compact but cosy. Lastly, we will recommend our relatives coming here to stay at hotel G Singapore‚Ä¶.

title: We will be back üòÄ
desc: Hotel G is situated along middle road. Nice location with great local food around. Upon check in, we had several requests but was promptly assisted by Howard. Thank you for the hospitality and we will be back again.

title: Great Stay!
desc: Was there for a trip with my group of friends. Small but cosy hotel. Special thanks to Howard and his team for arranging rooms on the same level for us. We are very happy with his service. We will recommend this hotel to our friends coming to Singapore.

title: A cozy super tiny room in the heart of the city
desc: I stayed at Hotel G for 5 nights during a conference. The room is super tiny but clean and very equipped with all toiletries. Due to the size of the room, it is good only for a single occupancy. The breakfast is fine but you may get bored after a few days. Tips 1. Daily cleaning is not default. In case you want your room cleaned every day, you have to inform the reception during check in. 2. The closest MRT is Bras basah which is also near department stores and eateries.

title: Amazing
desc: Lam, the housekeeping really keeps my room clean and fresh. I love the fact that he ensures I never get thirsty by always topping up fresh water in the room. Sheets and towels are always changed. Toilet always clean.

title: Enjoyable stay with parents and kids
desc: This is my 2nd stay in the hotel. We traveled 7 person, 2 elder and 2 kids on Jun 29 to 2 Jul 2023 (3 nights). Shower is perfect, bed and pillow are comfy and the room is clean and well maintained. There are western, Thai and Indian restos in the ground level. And many other restos in the nearby buildings.

title: Unbelievable experience at Hotel G Singapore
desc: I sleep in this hotel for 3 night with my family and everything it‚Äôs perfect.The service is really good and the room very clean The style on this hotel very unique and modern Overall i like this hotel so much and hopefully want to comebacks again later.

title: Enjoyable Stay
desc: The staff gave me a free upgrade to a double room. The best bed and pillows of my trip around Asia so far which contributed my first full nights sleep of the whole trip. I would happily recommend Hotel G to anyone staying in Singapore.

title: Great stay
desc: Very strategic location ‚Ä¶ very friendly staffs ‚Ä¶ very helpful housekeeping ‚Ä¶ very responsive housekeeping ‚Ä¶ very great breakfast ‚Ä¶ good experience staying here ‚Ä¶ will definitely come back again in the future ‚Ä¶

title: Great hotel convenient location
desc: Hotel was great, comfortable clean and everything we needed as a base for exploring this incredible city. Breakfast selection was good, the bar is great, best Singapore sling I had, and the staff were very friendly. Wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to stay here again. Thank you x

title: Great place to sleep overüòé especially the pillow so good
desc: We are handled by Daryl, very nice fo staff.. Helpful information and very kind hearted.. Area is quite nice, many choices of food and walking distance to mrt 1st floor place to chill also reasonable price

title: Responsible housekeeping
desc: Housekeeping Lam who in charge of level 15, he is really nice, helpful & responsible. We talked for a while when I was requesting new towel from him & he told me to look for him if I required anything & also asked me how was my stay here. Providing good service with right attitude üëçüèª Hotel G location is really good & convenient. Walk for 5mins to reach MRT, 2 stops to Chinatown, 7mins walk to Bugis+ shopping mall, reception provides taxi service for us too.

title: Good service, good location
desc: been here for business. even the room is small but clean and nice. They have very nice bar downstairs. I met very nice reception who give me free early check in without extra charge. I'll definitely come back here if I have chance.

title: Visited 2nd time after 3yrs, still the best choice
desc: Visited here 3 yrs ago. Now, price goes up a lot the same as other hotels in Singapore. Anyway, I still feel it is worth money and the best in this price range. Room is small but very well-designed. They are partnered with Metis amenity brand, love it. I didn‚Äôt have breakfast this time as it is pricey to add up, but remember it was very nice back then. Downstair has a bar as well, cannot comment, but 10 steps walking away there are local Thai restaurant and Indian restaurant (24hrs). Bencoolen is easy to travel to anywhere, but quiet and not crowded. If you like running, Fort Canning is open 24hrs, 5 mins running to, and a nice place to run up/downhill.

title: Room is very clean n tidy .Housekeeping service by Ras is best she is so polite n kind person I give her 5 out 5 rating
desc: The pillows n bed is most comfortable I ever slept on .Room is small but equipped with all facilities that's the best part.Housekeeping girl RAS is the best staff .she did job perfectly well done room is so clean n tidy .

title: Good service and friendly crew
desc: Today 23 Jun 2023 we staying at Hotel G which is near to Bugis area. When I reached hotel reception and Mr Daryl who assist me to do check in l. He was very friendly guy and he was probably provided excellent service for me. So appreciated what he did for me. Besides that the Hotel G room interiors also very simple design and nice. I definitely have a great experience with Hotel G. Highly recommended.

title: Great hotel in a great location just around Bugis Street
desc: The hotel is centrally located and offers everything you need. The rooms are small but stylish and comfortable. The most important part of the experience was the hotel staff - everyone is so nice, professional and helpful. A special thanks to Gina from the retaurant who took such good care of us - btw the restaurant is awesome! :-)

title: Excellent hotel with great amenities and location
desc: Excellent location, service is also top notch, very clean and comfortable. I appreciated the nice little details such as the boxed waters, mini fridge in room, emergency flash light, space under bed to store luggage, etc.

title: Not even a 2 star hotel
desc: Unfriendly staff in the restaurant. Even on asking for basic help they redirect to lobby. Extremely small rooms, no swimming pool, no facilities provided, uncomfortable beds so you can't even sleep properly. So if travelling with family, please avoid this hotel.

title: Great stay
desc: Khin who cleaned the room was nice. The hotel staff was quite helpful and accommodating. Hotel is also located perfectly and very well connected to the city. Breakfast was great too with many vegetarian options

title: Great place
desc: Very nice hotel, very well located, absolutely stylish, good breakfast, small rooms, but all you need, we liked it. We have been staying there three times, so very happy being at Hotel G. By the way: Extremely nice staff, thank you Thi Thi ;-)

title: Pleasant and convenient
desc: I always go to hotel g for my business trips as it‚Äôs centrally located with food and transport nearby. I like that their bed is big and it comes with a comfortable desk next to it, since I have to work throughout the night. I also found that their breakfast spread is quite complete. Anyway just wanted to give a shout out to Miao Jing, who was from the housekeeping crew. I stayed for a week this time, and she kept the room spotlessly clean each everyday when I got back. Am grateful for your hospitality ^_^

title: Nice and clean
desc: Staying in 1223 for 20 days. I would say I made a good choice. Hotel g really provides good service. HSKP Rena is always so friendly and supportive. She always kept smile and made me feel warm in this new country. Reception is also great üëç

title: Great stay with convenient location and clean room
desc: We booked a "Good King" room, everything was very good. Location is brilliant, walkable from Bencoolen MRT station, lots of eateries nearby. I got a great "Book 2nights, stay 3 nights" deal from the hotel website, and this I thought was great value for money. Check-in and Check-out was both smooth, room was good, it seems they made very good use of the small room space, so everything we needed was there in the room, size is small which is normal in Singapore. House-keeping can be set to on-request which I thought was nice. Overall, we enjoyed our stay here, and would definitely return back if visiting Singapore again. TIP: Book directly on the hotel website to get good deals.

title: Great Experience
desc: Had a pleasant stay in the hotel. Smooth check in & check out. All staffs is friendly and polite especially the Front Desk staffs. Looking forward to stay here again in the future. Will surely recommend my friends and family.

title: Good services
desc: Here is a good place to stay. The location is also good, downstairs has some bars and restaurants and it's just a 5 mins walk to the T. Mr. Lam, a great cleaning service. I deduct 1 star because the elevator was so confusing and slow.

title: Stay at G Hotel
desc: We had stayed there for 5 days, though the rooms are small - this is what we get in most of the hotels in Singapore. From our arrival, people were very friendly - especially you know we are tourists to a new country. Must take a special name here - Mr.Daryl Goh, I feel he understood our nervousness as we arrived little early with 2 kids. He made us feel confortable, gave us early check in (which we were lucky, as it was subject to availability ). And the stay was confortable - they had maintained everything well, must say the daily maintenance person did a good job to make everything look fresh. Best wishes to the whole team. God bless. Dr. Alex India

title: Great hotel ‚ù§Ô∏è thank!
desc: I really love the style of the hotel. Modern, simple and elegant. Staffs are always professional, especially Reena from HSKP. Always provide best service and kind help, which really makes my day!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

title: A must stay hotel in Singapore
desc: This hotel really go beyond my expectations. They have everything covered. First the hotel welcomes you with great smells just like 5 stars hotels did. The bed and pillows are really comfortable which will provide you a good night rest and we are refreshed the next day. Amenities are well provided with good shampoos and conditioner as well the hair dryer has the strongest blow in which will make you feel the treatment of a 5 stars, just this is in a mini and economical scale because the room size are smaller and retro feel. For restaurants and dining, there are fine Italian restaurant just below and also the 25 degree burger which makes perfect meal. Also, there are many local eateries nearby and this hotel has a perfect location in the middle of the city. Thank you Hotel G and

title: Functional hotel
desc: Good hotel in a great location. Rooms are very small 15 square meters which is tiny. Breakfast is adequate nice selection. Very functional hotel which is expensive for the size but Singapore generally is expensive everywhere. Hard to get hotels at a decent price.

title: Friendly staff and hotel surrounded by amenities
desc: Friendly and helpful housekeeping staff (LAM) and good hotel location. Recommended for family vacation as it was near to lot of amenities within walking distance. Con - hotel room abit small for Queen room.

title: Way too expensive, unfair pricing and credit card policy, tiny rooms and seems to be a former garage. Avoid this place!
desc: Pricing policy is unfair, it can be twice the price or more, as mentioned on Booking. Further, they quote and charge each room separately on your credit card. Finally, the rooms are very small and the reception is in the garage.. Avoid this place!!

title: Awesome
desc: Great Experience and excellent workers. They are ready to assist and cooperate. They are supportive and the room service is awesome. Nice spacious rooms with great art and Gallery. The food isn't bad at all.

title: Excellent Housekeeping by Ras
desc: Stayed with my family for 4 nights. We are vegetarian and the breakfast options for our diet were 'extremely limited' . Despite that, i am giving 5 star rating because of the housekeeping services, especially by Ras. She made our stay comfortable. very satisfied!

title: Small comfortable boutique hotel
desc: The bed was very comfortable, not too soft nor hard. Room small but good enough for me 1 person. Max 2 will still be fine but don‚Äôt expect much space. Though small all necessary amenities are provided for. The room is clean and the staff are very polite and efficient. I like the quaint set up of the hotel

title: Outstanding Service
desc: wei xiong from reservations was outstanding. he helped setup drop off of supplies for my girlfriend's birthday. Daryl and Debbie from front desk was friendly and helpful in setting the room up. Definitely return for another staycation soon

title: Good service and clean
desc: Great service from the team. The room is clean, comfortable, and well-designed. Order the service, but cutlery is not provided, small things but I end up using the coffee spoon, which makes even more bites than the regular spoon.

title: Hotel G stay
desc: The housekeeping services were wonderful. Housekeeping Khin helped me a lot and all the hotel staff was extremely kind and gentle. I loved my stay here and recommend the experience to everyone. I‚Äôm glad I chose this hotel for my stay

title: Good hotel
desc: Good: Room is clean and conformtable. Staffs are friendly. Have gym at level 3 so will very convenice for the person that has the habit of doing exercise. Recommendation: Should have a wardobe in room as somebody will have many clothes.

title: Very Good
desc: Housekeeping khin is very good Room is very clean and so kindly for she guset. Good service, she is friendly and so cute. When I need something She took good care of me. If I come back to this hotel I even let her take care of my room.

title: Good location ,clean
desc: Small room but good interior clean ,got free ice Good location bar wine at first floor is oK Near MRT bencooleen can walk form stunted city near library international SG Will come again next time will try Thai food it‚Äôs open 24 hour and tim sum near by

title: Great Location and Clean Rooms
desc: Great location , great cleaning and view . Our housekeeping Khin had our rooms so nicely done . We stayed for 5 days . Would recommend to stay here . The receptionist were too helpful and supportive in all sense.

title: Great hotel!
desc: Great hotel, always stay here. Excellent location, great food options. MRT stations nearby. Rooms are small and cosy, beds are great and now using a really nice brand shampoo/body wash. Staff are friendly and helpful

title: Awesome experience
desc: It‚Äôs a special experience during check -in. Excellent service, especially the staff name Howard, he really provides the amazing memories and services. It‚Äôs a relaxing place to stay here. Let‚Äôs visit!

title: Great location, good staff
desc: Great location, near to the MRT. Restaurants are also all around, very convenient for both business and vacation purposes. Guest service and Housekeeping (Mr.Lam) delivered awesome services to us during our stay!

title: A very good hotel!
desc: Very clean, environment is very good, location is very convenient to other places, the staff is very nice! House keeper Miao Ting is very friendly! This is my 3rd trip stay in this hotel, I'm sure will stay again for next business trip!

title: Perfect service
desc: Service staff at reception were polite and efficient, and our room is always kept clean throughout our entire 1 week stay. Housekeeper is also really helpful and sweet :) thank you Miao Ting for always keeping our room clean.

title: Perfect hotel stay if planning for Singapore!!
desc: I just loved the stay. The hotel has the perfect location and amazing vibes. I must thank the pretty Thi Thi for making the stay super comfortable and looking after even the smallest of things needed. Will visit back again soon. Highly recommended hotel.

title: Nice hotel but ...
desc: Very small room with limited facilities. eg. no fridge, shower above toilet, so toilet is mostly wet. No room space to walk. Hotel location is fantastic and close to everything. Great food outlets nearby also. Staff are friendly and a pleasure to deal with

title: Best Receiptionist
desc: The Receiptionist name Aiman.. He's really kind.. polite n very helpful to us.. Thank you so much Aiman.. God bless you.. Hotel.. Very clean nice n strategic location Hope will comeback n stay again at HOTEL G Spore..

title: Recommended hotel to stay in SGüòÅ
desc: The room is clean and need, the hotel service is really excellent, the price is affordable and for the staff name Aiman, he is really nice and welcoming person. Overall we really enjoyed our stay in this hotelüòÅ

title: Comfortable and cosy
desc: There‚Äôs a lot to like about Hotel G, the towels are fluffy, the bed‚Äôs comfortable, and the service is friendly and prompt. The housekeeping staff, Ras in particular, were very efficient and helpful. I even broke a glass by accident one evening and a staff member arrived pretty quickly with a vacuum cleaner to clear it up. Some reviews have complained about noisy neighbours, but the only time we ever heard people outside our room was briefly in the corridor outside. Nobody was ever so noisy that we couldn‚Äôt sleep. Space is at a premium in Singapore and Hotel G have done their best to make their rooms comfortable in a limited space. The bed in our room was against the window to maximise floor space, meaning one of us had to climb over the other to get to their side. Not an

title: An overall terrible experience
desc: Pros: - soft bed - decent location Cons: - The shower floods the entire bathroom every time the shower is on for more than 15 seconds because the floor is not sloped towards the drain and there‚Äôs nothing blocking the water. It becomes necessary to use all towels in the room to mop up the floor - Bathroom and parts of hotel smell of mold or mildew - Lots of noise from outside and inside. Strange popping noise from windows at random times often waking me up. Noisy AC (the hotel fixed this after complaining). Loud doors that slam shut ensure you wake up along with the first person on your floor. - Air conditioning behaves strangely. I kept AC at 20 at all times but sometimes it would become very cold or hot over night

title: Relaxing stay at Hotel G
desc: I've stayed at Hotel G for the second time and their pillows and the beddings are always the best and the fluffiest. Also, their interior is quite nice and subtle making our stay relaxing. Their housekeeper, Lam, who cleaned our room is also very kind and helpful. I only mentioned i want the rubbish to be cleared not realizing the bathroom needs cleaning as well but Lam took the initiative to clean it without me needing inform him. Thanks, Lam! Thanks, Hotel G for the comfiest stay ever!

title: G-hotel is a good place to stay
desc: Nice hotel, in the centre nearby the metro. Everything was good especially Thi Thi, she did a very good job for cleaning our room. The hamburgers from restaurant 25 degrees were also very tasty. Go and taste it yourself

title: Hotel G Great Experience
desc: The location of this hotel is very convenient, with plenty of bus stops and subway stations nearby. Thank you to Housekeeping Lam for always making the room feel brand new with every cleaning. The only minor issue is that the waiting time for the elevator is slightly longer.

title: Housekeeping
desc: My pillows were clean and my room and toilet were very clean and organized. The attention of the housekeeper who cleans very well. Including the service of drinking water in the room is also very good.

title: Great place to stay!
desc: Stay was great! Their cleaning staff are professional and keep things in great order - specially Thi Thi cleaned really well! Hotel rooms are smaller, but it is high quality. Breakfast is fantastic.

title: Amazing stay! Housekeeper Mr. Lam made our experience a 10/10!
desc: We had a great stay in Hotel G and it was very clean and great location. On top of that the service was amazing. Our Housekeeper Mr. Lam was very friendly, helpful and nice. He gave us a beyond service. He gave us a room service right away when we requested. He communicated to us so friendly with warm heart. Thank you very much for your great service, Mr. Lam.

title: Nice experience
desc: Thanks for my housekeeping RAS to take good care of my room everyday for my 18 days trip. I really appreciate that. Nice breakfast, and conveniently located. The room is clean, quiet. The air conditioning is nice

title: I highly commend Miao Jing for her warm service
desc: I'm happy here. I highly commend Miao Jing for her warm service. First of all, the hotel is beautiful and I enjoy it very much. Then, the bed is so big and soft that I don't want to get up every morning. It's great here. If I ever come to this country again, I want to live here again.

title: Impressive commitment to service
desc: Small but tastefully furnished. Well located. Duty manager was highly attentive to a minor irregularity I encountered in the room and was fast to make good on the issue. Impressive commitment to deliver on a high level of service. üëç

title: I commend the staff of Thi Thi
desc: I came to Singapore for the first time and traveled alone. All the staff here are kind, too. In particular, Thi Thi employees are always smiling and clean up their rooms very neatly. When I run into the Thi Thi employee, I feel like I made a new friend. I think it would be better if a Thi Thi employee works at a reception that is responsible for the hotel's image. If I go on a trip to Singapore next time, I really want to meet the Thi Thi employees again.

title: Housekeeping was great
desc: Hotel G is good located. It is close to the metro station Bencoolen. Breakfast could be better. Hotel staff is really friendly, especially Thi Thi our housekeeper was really nice! She made a great job!

title: Very Good
desc: Very Good Stay at Hotel G, the location is good & MRT station nearby. Many food around the hotel, especially thanks to the housekeeping Thi Thi. She always welcome us when we out and back to the hotel room. Definitely will stay hotel g when come to Singapore

title: Cozy clean and convenient stay
desc: The moment I entered the hotel, i was amazed at how fast they checked me in despite reaching earlier as I was tired. The room I chose was single bed but it is very clean and cosy. All the amenities that i need is there. The bed is so soft and comfortable that I sleep well for my 2nights stay. The housekeeper Thi Thi did a great job for maintaining the cleanliness. There are many eateries around hotel area which is convenient for me to just walk over. Pleasant stay as it is a quiet place. Will choose to stay here again in November business trip.

title: Amazing stay
desc: Great place to stay & food was amazing very close to MRT. Most of the things including bar is inside hotel. Very welcoming staff house keeping yin yin kept the room cozy all the time. That‚Äôs 5* with cleanliness. Felt home great place over all

title: Good value hotel with a nice location
desc: Very efficient, comfortable and fairly priced hotel in a great location in Singapore. The rooms are not the biggest but was especially fine for me travelling solo and only with a very small bag. The few staff I met were all very helpful and the location is definitely a big plus. Easy walking distance from shopping areas and plenty of restaurants or bars in the immediate vicinitiy.

title: Great Stay, Clean and convenient
desc: Room looks small but everything is enough. Amenities is sufficient and smell good. No musty smell no ant no insect is really important! Water pressure is good and no restrict on hot water. There is no shower curtain or door so the floor and toilet bowl a bit wet after shower. But it will dry overnight, not a big question. Sound insulation is acceptable, can‚Äôt hear noise at night. But I feel like the music playing in corridor is annoying in the morning and also can here sound of housekeeping making room upstair or neighbours. Also the location is good, it nears two mrt stations ,bus station on the opposite side and can walk to bugis around 10 minutes. There has a small centre where included famous ya kun kaya toast and dessert. ÈÅ©ÂêàÂñÆ‰∫∫/ÊÉÖ‰æ∂ÔºåÊàøÈñìÁ¥∞‰ΩÜÁî®ÂìÅÈΩäÔºåÊ∞¥Â£ìÂ•ΩÂ§†ËÄå‰∏îÊ≤íÊúâÈôêÁÜ±Ê∞¥

title: Good housekeeping
desc: Housekeeping Lam is doing great job and nice attitude, it‚Äôs really good services, I will look forward to come and visit hotel G again.

title: Family Stay
desc: Great stay at G Hotel with family, came with breakfast. Returned back for second time! Staff at reception were very pleasant & helpful. Rooms although compact but very modern with great toiletries. We had American Breakfast served wonderfully by Papa & Abigale, very pleasant & sweet staff. :)

title: Great value for your buck
desc: Staff at reception and door make you feel very welcome..check in very efficient and a breeze....no need for deposit or credit card check. Room is compact but comfortable....good range of toiletries ...mask also provided...water pressure is good... Room has no fridge though...room safe is provided... Breakfast is very nice and service is good.... Had a very pleasant stay ..will return again.....

title: First time ever to Singapore. One of the best thing I could ever had at that time.
desc: I was third year of University and we went to Singapore as part of our school trip. However we decided to level-up the experience by paying for our own hotel. Worth every dime. Nice view, nice room, nice food and service. Near the MRT so travel is not a big deal. It used to be called Big Hotel and now Hotel G.

title: Close to Bugis
desc: I liked the location and enjoyed the stay. The rooms were compact yet classy. Good for a single person. Breakfast was good. The best thing was the happening bar during evening hours. However the lifts were too busy. It took a bit of time to reach floor 13th from ground.üòõ

title: Perfect for solo traveller
desc: If you're travel alone, this is perfect for the stay. Room is small but it's enough for a solo traveller. Clean room, easy access to Bugis but a bit far to MRT station. Overall is good enough and the hotel is quite modern.

title: Excellent stay!
desc: It was my first time staying at Hotel G and it was a very pleasant experience. The staff are extremely helpful and friendly, and check-in and check-out processes were super fuss-free and fast. The room itself was very clean, although it leans slightly on the smaller side. I'd only wished there was more selection and variety in the breakfast spread, but it's still pretty decent and standard. A big plus for the hotel is the location. It's close to many different bus stations and MRT stations that can take you conveniently to most places. Would definitely stay at this hotel again if i were to go back to SIngapore!

title: Middle Road location can't be beat.
desc: I have now been travelling for over 35 years and had written many reviews on Tripadvisor and post them as accurately as I can and no I do not get paid in anyway for these reviews. I also try to make my reviews constructive and make suggestions for improving the customer's' experience. Check in Experience (Including recognition of the status of the hotel guest) I booked this property using a 3rd party website which included breakfast. On arrival we were greeted by a friendly staff member and were assigned a room. Room Assignment, Breakfast & Lounge ‚Ä¢ We were given a room which I have to say was clean and modern with the sink in the room itself. But we were 2 people and with our luggage it was just impossible to stay in that room. So I called front desk and asked to see their

title: A great find!!
desc: LOVED our stay at Hotel G! What a quaint boutique hotel in the heart of the city. Only a 10-15 minute walk to Orchard Road or Clarke Quay. The rooms were so well kitted out - use of space was marvelous. Even though two of us stayed in the most economical room, it did not feel like we were tripping over each other. The bathroom was a tiny bit small but then for the price, it was great value in total! Helps that there is a fab wine bar and a burger place right downstairs - or if street food is what you fancy, just outside the hotel you can find a late night roti stall + Thai food place. Def A+, will only stay here when we return to Singapore!

title: Beautiful hotel
desc: Would definitely recommend to others. Wish I had stayed more than one night. The room is clean, beautifully presented, and I loved that it had boxed water in a time where we are trying to minimise plastics. Thank you!

title: Compact but well appointed
desc: I stayed there for a couple of nights on my way to Europe. The hotel is really well located. Close to the Bugis metro (though it is still a 10‚Äô walk- not ideal with heavy luggage)from where you can hop on the metro to about anywhere in Singapore very easily. The area around the hotel has everything: markets, temples, shops, restaurants and is in walking distance from town centre. The room I stayed in was compact, but very well organised. It did not feel cramped. There was a big window with a nice view over the city, a compact but pleasant bathroom. Registration at 2pm is a bit late I find. I am still on the lookout for hotels with more flexible registration hours.

title: Unremarkable
desc: Our hotel stay was ok but unremarkable. The hotel theme is great but the room is very compact and the reception areas tiny. I hated having to access the hotel through a bar that was busy at night. The internet was good and location was great but would probably look elsewhere for my next stay in Singapore.

title: Nice modern room with good location
desc: The new hotel with modern decoration and fully-equipped functions. The room is a bit small but have everything except fridge, however, the hotel provide iced-making machine on floor. The location is very close to public transportation and very easy to go to all tourist attractions.

title: First time to Hotel G
desc: Location great, easy to access and get a food. Near to MRT and market, even Bugis shopping streets, just walking distance. Great Internet access. Convenience for short trip. But room is small, lift is small, is hard when you have big luggage. The main reception entrance is hiding in 2nd floor. The main road entrance actually is restaurant, 25 degree, you need to carry your luggage to climb the staircase to get the lift to reception counter. This is the difficulty when you got luggage.

title: Nice Budget Stay
desc: Staff was helpful and attentive. Room was teeny, and the shower situation was a little odd, but the place was clean and well-kept. Shuttle bus delivery from the airport was scary -- dropped off in the back alley late at night because the bus doesn't fit around the front? Odd.

title: Awesome Hotel
desc: The room, the breakfast, the bar and the staff was simply amazing. Would recommend Hotel G to all my friends and colleagues. This was my first time away from my home, that too in a different country but my stay at Hotel G was really smooth and welcoming.

title: Pawin
desc: My girlfriend and I have been traveling for Singapore many times. This is our first time to stay at here and this location. Obviously, Hotel G provides convenience for us in terms of location, facilities, entertainment and so on.

title: Stylish and best situated Hotel
desc: Very well situated Hotel, with smaller, but cozy rooms and very attractive restaurant. Very friendly staff. I enjoyed the French Michelin Chef, who was serving a very nice Food. I would be glad to come back by my next visit of Singapore.

title: Good hotel at a good location
desc: Overall a positive experience with the hotel. The rooms are a little small but that wasn't much of an issue, the sound proofing is good. Our room had a shower door that didn't close so it was a little awkward but otherwise not much to complain.

title: Cheap and cheerful
desc: My first experience on arriving at Hotel G was confusion! My airport transfer dropped me at the back of the hotel in a laneway and I had no idea how to access the hotel. Fortunately a passing staff member guided me to the front of the building. I then had to make my way to the first floor where the reception is. Staff members were helpful however. Room is very small even though I paid for a king room. Breakfast was good but the coffee pots were frequently empty.

title: Good enough
desc: Good location only room was not completely read when we checked in. Good shower, good bed. Little bit small room. Breakfast is ok. There was rice, but no additional meat for the rice. Bread choices should be more or add croissants or something.

title: Inconvienence Internet and inproper cleaning service
desc: Inconvenience Internet due to 24 hours continuing log in status, so everyday have to log in again and again in 24 hours during staying days. And until coming back to hotel by 4pm, still no cleaning status, so curious what time the cleaner is cleaning. The worst thing was that I realized that no shampoo was prepared in the room in the last day morning, so I did wash my hair with conditioner and soap ONLY.

title: Very Arty and chic
desc: Great place to stay in the heart of the art center of Singapore. Great restaurant in the premises with a scrumptious food and an extensive wine list. The French Chef has a great many signature dishes to delight you with.

title: Good location and good decorate but room is not clean
desc: Good location and good decorate and good breakfast but the room is not clean, there is a dust on the edge of the door, the window is clearly visible. Bathroom small and not very comfortable. ‡∏ó‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏î‡∏µ ‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏´‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏™‡∏∞‡∏≠‡∏≤‡∏î ‡∏•‡πá‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏µ‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πá‡∏Å

title: Has potential but falls short
desc: Potentially a value for money place to stay. Love the decor and style of the place and the room was very clean and tidy. Didn‚Äôt have a very big issue with the small room space - it was cozy for my partner and I. The breakfast options were good. However we were there at 930 (breakfast ended at 1030) and many of the items were running out (milk, ham, eggs). There were refills but they were slow. Also, there were flies everywhere that landed on my food and the fruit platters. The place was probably short of service staff that caused these issues. Overall an okay stay (the venue was fantastic) but so many areas for improvement.

title: Nice!
desc: This is a really nice hotel. The room is small but cozy. I didn't go to Singapore to sit in the room so the fact it was small meant nothing. The staff was friendly. The restaurant Ginett has really good food. This hotel is 2 blocks from the bus stop for the hop on hop off bus.

title: No freezer
desc: The location of the hotel is fine. There were water machines and ice dispensers in the hallway, so there is nothing to say if there is a freezer in the room. It is best if there is a laundry room in the hotel. There was no bathtub, but the pressure in the shower was sufficient.

title: Hip hotel
desc: Went there for a family trip with 2 kids under 10. The hotel is super chic with fun decor, service is friendly and efficient. Lobby was small and super busy with guests checking in and out, breakfast spread is decent. Convenient location, near a lot of great hawker places and restaurants.

title: Good location, service could be better
desc: The hotel is centrally located close to shopping and attractions. However, customer service, particularly from front desk needs improvement. Bell service is slow and check in as well. Otherwise good place to stay.

title: Unchanged bedsheet
desc: I booked 2 nights in the hotel. the location and overall feel is nice. However, there was unpleasant experience as the receptionist told me the bed sheets has not changed while I check in (in afternoon) and provided 2 glass of wine as compensation. At later time (night) when I back to the room, they confirmed the bed sheets has been changed to a new one. However, I can still found the old dirt (a few yellow spot (may be Garlic or whatever look disgusting) dye on the same position of the bed sheet, which means they didn't change it! I called the reception to change again, but they told there was none to provide the service and have to wait until the next day... All the rooms are full and not able to change room. I ended up request them to provide a new bed sheet and I have to

title: Brilliant
desc: I feel highly enjoyable and cheerful when living here during the 4 days. Enough space and classical room atmosphere for guest is a special experience especially visiting Singapore guests. Next time I will come again.

title: A fully claustrophobic experience
desc: Staff were helpful. However, I will never return to this hotel. If you come for more than one night, be aware that rooms are 9-m2, that the room can remain untidy until 19.30pm by hotel policies (I returned from a fieldtrip at 17.30pm and the room was yet to be tidied up). Cleaning in the room was poor...with the bed just covered back. Breakfast is diverse but mediocre. Choose some!where else

title: Chic hotel with a great location
desc: The hotel is contemporary. Rooms are small but workable. Location is great. Breakfast selection leaves a bit to be desired, but is appropriate for a 4* hotel. I think they were short of towels when we visited, as they didn't put new towels after getting the used ones. This happened for the two rooms in our group. I don't particular like shower curtains (which are the ones used in this hotel), and would have preferred a door enclosed shower - but that's a personal preference.

title: Tiny and Cozy
desc: As this hotel was booked accidentally while browsing for hotels,I have no idea what to expect. Upon arrival, we had some hiccups to check in. Both parties was frustrated as the booking company did not handle our case in a professional manner. But then when things got sorted out,we got complimentary upgrade to a better room by the hotel. The staff were polite and very helpful. Bath and bed very clean and comfortable. Surely will recommend this place.

title: CheapConvenientCleanConnected
desc: Small room but very well designed Clever use of space while using good quality fittings Well located Friendly Staff and efficient check-in Very comfy bed but a little awkward for a couple but on my own - perfect

title: Clever & Cosy
desc: Clever use of space & loved the little touches, especially the toiletries. The gym was lovely though a tad too dark and makes me wanna sleep rather than workout. Loved the pics in the gym. 25 degrees and Ginett provides excellent service and food. Jared from Ginett was very pleasing and helpful.

title: Fantastic
desc: Everything is very good in this hotel: very nice and clean room, friendly and helpful staff, amazing breakfast included, very good location (close to restaurants, subway stations). I highly recommend it.

title: Cosy comfortable room, great location
desc: The hotel is good value in a great location. Our room was cosy but we comfortably fit myself & my husband & our luggage without too much trouble. The hotel staff were all friendly and provided a great service. The included breakfast was good. The gym facilities were great. The only thing missing was a swimming pool

title: Nice overall
desc: Very friendly and helpful staff. The room included a cell phone to use and free calls to the US. Major plus, my cell didn't work in Singapore. Downside: small room, no comp breakfast, $ of hotel food.

title: Good value for money despite some issues
desc: Got frustrated about check-in part, early check in at morning, was advised to come back after2pm and when I came back 4pm, room still not available, no definite time for when able to get room nor other solution. Many people and kids stuck at a crowded reception. I was upset by how hotel coped with the situation on the day although finally got sorted around 530pm. After 3n stay, good location, reasonable price, tidy room. Breakfast includes various options, western and asian, fresh, simple and nice. In the end, hotel offer an airport transfer as apology and I really appreciate. Will definitely recommend it for good value for money

title: good hotel, near downtown.
desc: Location wise is great. Breakfast is just acceptable, not up to my taste yet, but coffee is good. Hard to access to the lobby and lift especially if you are partly immobility or immobility. You need to take a staircase passing through the bar to reach the lift

title: Weekend getaway
desc: Really cosy room :) However, I can‚Äôt seem switch off the dressing area lights without taking the room card out, and when I do so, the room became a little stuffy. Other than that, I really like the location of the hotel.

title: Good hotel experience.
desc: Good hotel specially for the location. Might be a bit confuse to find the recieption when enter and the room a bit small which is the same for every hotel through out Singapore. Would definitely be back .

title: staff experience is terrible
desc: during my stay, staffs has been entering my room without any permission. this is rude and disrespect. I have informed the counter regards of my hours extension yet they keep calling up asking for details. I supposed they should have my details during my check in..so I not sure why are they keep disturbing my sleep.

title: Clean and in good location
desc: Everything was good and I especially liked that there was a French Restaurant at the street level entrance to the Hotel. Rooms were compact but cozy with interesting decor. the only downside was lack of a fridge in the room. Upsides included an in room safe that was big enough to sore a good sized laptop computer.

title: Nice
desc: The room is so small but the staff are very nice and willing to help I lost my wallet and they found it and not single cents was taken but the rooms are so small but it was a nice stay but next time I have to take a better room the room was to cramp and the shower water could get into your room please make a better romm for a single person stay

title: Novel concept but compact rooms
desc: The overall theme of the hotel is appreciative but the space of the room is so limited. However, the staff was friendly and helpful in retaining our luggage till we sight visit. It would have been better if the room had space.

title: A convenient place with an affordable price
desc: It is near to the Bencoolen MRT, Rocher MRT and Bugis MRT station. Only a few minutes walk. It is 10 minutes away from shopping malls. It is a comfortable place to stay but you don't expect it will be luxurious and spacious. One little minor thing is that they have no lift at the front door. (but there is one at the back door.)

title: Stopover
desc: Room was very small although second visit on return was better with a king bed. Very clean. Also on our return we went to the hotels breakfast only to find new managers had cut costs and changed the menu while also putting the price up significantly. Hot food included scrambled eggs and baked beans but No bacon!! You can't have eggs without bacon! Not only that, they took all the food away while paying customers were still eating! The machine coffee was undrinkable. For the price you should at least get a handmade coffee!

title: Firm but fair
desc: Rooms are tiny (matchbox size) yet they have everything one needs. Beds are wall to wall yet they have desks with a chair. Prices are firm, but Hotel G makes it work with a central location and hip aesthetic. Nice restaurants downstairs with a variety of price options. My wife and I walked from Hotel G to both Orchard Rd and MBS so access is fine throughout the CBD.

title: Excellent
desc: Great service, nice room, great location. Liked the fact that the housekeeping crew was happy to provide me with more shower gel at my request. Only thing I felt could be improved upon was the soundproofing of the room.

title: Cool design
desc: Great location, clean, trendy design of the rooms. I especially liked the mobile provided in the room, which you can take with you and use internet (google, maps) outside of the accommodation to explore the city. Only thing I didn't like is the shower together with the toilet, so the space would be flooding with water after the shower and it would take long time to dry.

title: My view of Hotel G
desc: Overall it was an wonderful experience during the staying. If I got say something for the improvement, I think it would be the shower, the door curtain is unable to prevent the water spilling to the outside, as a result the floor is wet and slip

title: AMAZING
desc: Excellent service, unique, artistic, clean, great french restaurant downstairs of building, close to centre about 10 minutes walking, room small and good for single or couple, definitely stay there again!!! LOVE LOVE LOVED IT!!!!

title: Great holiday experience starts with a great first impression of the hotel
desc: Almost everything about my stay at Hotel G was perfect. The only thing is the matter of housekeeping and toiletry / towel provision. On the first and second day of stay, I was not provided with a tube of shower gel, which I thought was probably not provided to start with. However a tube a provided on the third day. The same with floor towel, it was replaced on the third and fourth day, so I had to resort to using the bath towel to wipe the floor dry instead. Apart from this, every aspect of my stay was perfect.. I loved the compact and modern design of the rooms The location was great and it was easy access to anywhere I wanted to go to.

title: Great hotel
desc: Stayed over in Singapore on my way to Copenhagen. Excellent hotel convenient to all I needed orchard road . China town and little India. Cheap taxi to all sites. Staff were friendly and helpful. Stored my luggage all day. Toilet in the lobby so I could freshen up before going to the airport.

title: Everything is excellent.
desc: location is excellent. near to everything. 2blks away from mrt. near to bugis junction. lota of 7/11 nearby. very comfy bed.kudos to our room attendant Leila Rivera for attending to our needs on tye 1st day of stay. well be back here again and will recommend too.

title: Good hotel experience!
desc: Good hotel location. Near MRT stations and bus stops. Amazing hotel rooms. Nice hotel staffs. Would also like to commend Leila Rivera for good service. Will definitely book the same hotel for our next visit!

title: Haunted hotel
desc: Extreme small room. Very haunted feeling. Left the hotel within 3 hours. Staff was extremely rude to my kid that reception girl. No window in the room. We asked for king sized bed and got something less than a queen size.

title: VERY small room
desc: No place to put 2 suitcases. Sink is the size of a 5 gallon water cooler in the hall of the room. Bed was against the wall on three sides. Had to climb over my wife to get out of bed. Walkable to Little India

title: Hotel G
desc: Good location. Helpful staff. Would stay again in this hotel. Easy to book GRAB. The location of the hotel is convenient. The staff are helpful. There are two restaurants in the hotel. Connecting to wifi is ok.

title: Highly recommend!
desc: Very well-design hotel Super friendly and helpful staff, always with nice smile and good service attitude. And well-prepared breakfast,simple, health and have different choices. A very well experience here!

title: Overall Good Experience
desc: Pro: They allowed me to check in early which was a blessing. The room size was efficient & follows a minamilist style. The room was well air conditioned (bonus!) Great location, I felt very safe. Con: The sheets made me itch throughout the night. There were random hairs found on my bedding & when I looked through the snack box, there were hairs along the bottom (gross). Breakfast was an extra surcharge and honestly not with it. The halls were humid and had a moldy smell to it! The walls were paper thin, heard noises all hours of the night. Overall the cons are just suggestions to improve the overall quality of guests stays. Housekeeping just needs more attention to detail.

title: staffs are kindly
desc: The location of the hotel is very convenient to the various attractions. Although the room is small, it is not easy to open the luggage, but it is acceptable. There are a lot of rooms, soundproof quality and good sleep quality every day. Although the breakfast style is not much, it is enough to eat enough. The hotel staff are very friendly and courteous and patient. Overall it is a very nice hotel. title: THE BEST HOTEL IN SINGAPORE
desc: I am really like the family room, will looking forward to stay in family room in my next holiday. Being very helpful because there is a handy phone that makes me not fear to get lost ini singapore. Their room is very neat, maybe only the ac that really cold.

title: Average
desc: Htl is nice but my room is to small, my breakfast experience the food isnt tasty, maybe not enough salt n paper or other ingredients, credit point for this htl is near to public transport ( Bus& MRT) and 24 hrs street food ' Al Jaelani' located just one step frm the htl, just incase if u r hungry at midnight, room is to small n breakfast food frm the htl not to good

title: Great little place to stay...
desc: Although the room was small comparative to others I've stayed in, it was well laid out and the location of this hotel was perfect to explore this great city. Restaurant served a very good breakfast and the bar was happening!!

title: Cozy Room
desc: My room was the perfect size. My bed was very comfortable. I liked the style of my room. Good shower pressure. Good air conditioner. Short distance to the metro and restaurants. Strong wifi. Tasty breakfast.

title: Recommended Stay For Those On A Budget
desc: For the price we paid for the standard room with daily breakfast, it was good value for money.Yes there were a few minuses including room size very small, difficulty in locating / entering the hotel at street level and slow check in.. However this was more than made up with the friendly and proactive service provided by staff during our 4 days stay plus the convenient location of the hotel. Breakfast was passable with a variety of dishes to choose from. If you are staying for a couple of days, I recommend you pay extra for a bigger King Size Room for enhance comfort.

title: Poor breakfast and room facilities
desc: Poor breakfast. Limited choices of food and you have to fight for tables and food in the morning. Poor room facilities. Two people room but only provide 1 toothbrush and 1 pair of slippers. Staff often forget to refill tea bags, toothbrush and other things on the next day. Indeed, the room is very small as a 4-star hotel.

title: Great Customer Service
desc: Fantastic boutique hotel. Lots of restaurants nearby. Staff are amazing. Particularly want to thank Shaun for really going to extra few yards to make me feel special. This guy is a superstar. Quiet location and compact but friendly rooms. Great value for money.

title: Love Hotel G Sooo Much
desc: Love your service, and location,The staff is very enthusiastic, explaining everything is clear Let me have a good memory with my girlfriend, I will definitely come back next time, thank you Hotel G !!!

title: Could have been better
desc: Small rooms not well soundproofed so you can hear the neighbors. Breakfast: not enough seats for all the guests and poor choice of food. Loud music in the bar afternoon and evening. Good location, but that's it!

title: perfect stay for a citytrip
desc: clean room, free water, great breakfast, small gym, close to orchardroad, close to public transportation, good location, not enough elevators for so many poeple, not enough space in the breakfast area for all guests of the hotel (you have to hurry for a place, even when it's not cleaned up)

title: Good but rooms too small.
